job_text: ['', '1 year of experience in the position offered or 1 year of experience applying engineering and science to energy or transportation policy questions', 'Minimum Requirements', '1 year of experience performing mathematical programming, data mining, or statistical analysis', "Requires a master's or foreign equivalent degree in industrial engineering, computer science or a related field ", '1 year of experience modeling fuel economy and greenhouse gas automotive emission regulations', "Requires a master's or foreign equivalent degree in industrial engineering, computer science or a related field 1 year of experience in the position offered or 1 year of experience applying engineering and science to energy or transportation policy questions1 year of experience performing mathematical programming, data mining, or statistical analysis1 year of experience performing optimization (problems, methods, and software), statistics (basic concepts, regression models, discrete choice models), or energy/engineering economics 1 year of experience coding C/C++ with STL or C#, Tableau, Alteryx, and Qlikview1 year of experience modeling fuel economy and greenhouse gas automotive emission regulationsExperience may be, but need not be, acquired concurrently", '1 year of experience performing optimization (problems, methods, and software), statistics (basic concepts, regression models, discrete choice models), or energy/engineering economics ', 'Experience may be, but need not be, acquired concurrently', 'Job Description', '1 year of experience coding C/C++ with STL or C#, Tableau, Alteryx, and Qlikview', 'About Us']

['', 'Prior experience writing product level code', 'Some exposure and textbook knowledge of Active Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Transfer Learning and/or Meta-Learning.', 'Track record of publishing papers in top Machine Learning journals', 'Develop and fine-tune custom solutions for our clients and convert the gained knowledge into scalable ML products.', 'Be a thought-leader and represent the company at conferences and write blog posts to educate the industry on Alectio’s mission.', 'Alectio is a B2B Machine Learning company, and the first company to offer solutions to help ML experts build ML models with less data - and hence, faster, cheaper, and more sustainably. With people looking to reduce their operational costs more than ever, we are growing fast and expanding to new verticals after an initial focus in autonomous driving and robotics.', 'Nice to have', '\xa0', 'Skills & Experience', "Master's degree of above in either an applied scientific field or in Computer Science.", "Master's degree of above in either an applied scientific field or in Computer Science.An outstanding understanding of theoretical Machine Learning, in particular of Deep Learning.\xa0Experience with modern Machine Learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.Ability to develop Machine Learning models from scratch without relying on an existing librariesSome exposure and textbook knowledge of Active Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Transfer Learning and/or Meta-Learning.At least 3 years of experience developing Machine Learning models with a track record of your work being used in production.At least 5 years of experience writing code in Python, Scala, Java or another language.Ability to learn and adopt new technologies quickly.Soft skills, e.g. team player, clear and concise communication, problem solver, sense of humor.", 'Collarorate with the Engineering team regarding all things Machine Learning; even if you will not be expected to push your models to production on your own, you should be able to develop an end-to-end solution with the support of an engineer.', 'Ability to act as your own product manager and to write your own Product Requirement Documents', 'Working knowledge of Docker', '2-3 years working with data curation and/or Active Learning would be ideal', 'This role could evolve into a leadership/management role if desired.', 'Experience with modern Machine Learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.', 'Responsibilities', 'We are currently looking for a Machine Learning Scientist to join our ML team and help us take our product and algorithms to the next level. Our research is heavily focused on Active Learning, Reinforcement Learning and Meta-Learning. Your work would be a combination of ML research and ML product development (you will not be asked to push models in production on your own, but to apply our algorithm in new, unexpected ways, combine them with state-of-the-art research, etc.) In the longer term, this position can lead to either an applied ML scientist role (with a heavier focus on making ML functional for our users) or an ML researcher role. Our team is small but mighty (12 employees), and virtually everyone is heavily specialized on Machine Learning.', 'An outstanding understanding of theoretical Machine Learning, in particular of Deep Learning.\xa0', 'At least 5 years of experience writing code in Python, Scala, Java or another language.', 'Work closely with the Chief Scientist and the CEO, as well as other members of the Engineering team to design the next generation of ML platform.', 'Work closely with the Chief Scientist and the CEO, as well as other members of the Engineering team to design the next generation of ML platform.Develop and fine-tune custom solutions for our clients and convert the gained knowledge into scalable ML products.Collarorate with the Engineering team regarding all things Machine Learning; even if you will not be expected to push your models to production on your own, you should be able to develop an end-to-end solution with the support of an engineer.Be a thought-leader and represent the company at conferences and write blog posts to educate the industry on Alectio’s mission.In the short-term, you will balance research (including partnerships with top-tier universities) with the development of real-life products. Part of this role consists in writing research papers and conducting research.In the longer-term, this position can evolve either into an ML research role (where your long-term focus will be development of new cutting edge technology and publication in top research journals), or a product development role (where you will implement new technologies as part of the Alectio stack for our customers).This role could evolve into a leadership/management role if desired.', 'In the short-term, you will balance research (including partnerships with top-tier universities) with the development of real-life products. Part of this role consists in writing research papers and conducting research.', 'Ability to develop Machine Learning models from scratch without relying on an existing libraries', 'Ability to learn and adopt new technologies quickly.', 'At least 3 years of experience developing Machine Learning models with a track record of your work being used in production.', 'Soft skills, e.g. team player, clear and concise communication, problem solver, sense of humor.', '2-3 years working with data curation and/or Active Learning would be idealTrack record of publishing papers in top Machine Learning journalsAbility to act as your own product manager and to write your own Product Requirement DocumentsPrior experience writing product level codeWorking knowledge of Docker', 'In the longer-term, this position can evolve either into an ML research role (where your long-term focus will be development of new cutting edge technology and publication in top research journals), or a product development role (where you will implement new technologies as part of the Alectio stack for our customers).']

['', 'Experienced in Python', "Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field like statistics, economics, engineering, or applied math accepted. Operations Research Ph.D. preferred.", 'Wellness perk for salaried roles', 'About the Role', "Spin is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment in an unlawful matter. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all individuals. Spin treats all employees and job applicants on the basis of merit, qualifications, and competence without regard to any qualified individuals' sex, race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, gender (including pregnancy, breastfeeding, or related medical condition), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic characteristic or information, marital status, military and veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state or federal law. Spin also considers qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable local, state, and federal law.\xa0", 'Unlimited PTO for salaried roles', 'Apply statistical techniques to develop analyses and models toward insights improving growth, experience, and operations', 'Spin is a fast-growing micromobility company committed to a world with clean air, liveable cities, safe streets, and widespread access to convenient, affordable transportation. If you’re searching for a top-tier career where you can make a difference and dynamically collaborate within a creative, lively environment—Spin welcomes you!', 'Our team consists of people that are passionate about creating finely polished and intuitive experiences and, at the same time, obsess over performance and reliability of what we build. We challenge the status quo and strive towards finding the best way to solve problems.', 'Design, build, train and test Machine Learning models', 'We work in very small groups to keep processes and overhead low, so we have a lot of trust and accountability to perform the work required to build the best product.', 'Opportunity to join a fast-growing startup and help shape and establish the company’s industry leadershipCompetitive health benefitsUnlimited PTO for salaried rolesPre-tax commuter benefitsMonthly cell phone bill stipendWellness perk for salaried roles', 'Founded in 2017, and now a subsidiary of Ford Motor Company, we have worked together with cities, campuses, community groups, and businesses to expand internationally. Even as we expand, we maintain the close feeling of a small business, with “fireside chats” chats led by our company’s founders, weekly OKR pop-up videos, music-infused presentations at our All Hands meetings, and more. During this time of working remotely, our creativity and shared goals have kept us united and bonded within our virtual community.', 'Collaborate with product, data, engineering, business and operations teams to frame analytical problems and design ML solutions', 'We are a diverse team of artists, engineers, designers, urban planners, policymakers, marketers, and operators. ['', 'ManpowerGroup is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)', 'selva.kumar@experis.com', 'Details:', 'Location:', 'Job Title:', 'Please forward updated resume in word format to Selva - selva.kumar@experis.com', 'Selva - selva.kumar@experis.com', "We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our technology team to solve exciting business problems in the domain of commercial banking, payments and financial services. Candidates must have a strong curiosity for data and a proven track record of successfully applying rigorous scientific methods with proficiency in data science knowledge and technical capabilities. This is a unique opportunity to apply your skills and have a direct impact on global business. The ideal candidate will have a strong knowledge of ML, NLP, Deep Learning, Knowledge Graphs and have experience working with massive amounts of data. They should also have strong software engineering skills and the ability to build systems that reach JP Morgan scale.What You'll Do: Develop and Train production grade ML models on large-scale datasets to solve various business usecases for Commercial Banking. Use large scale data processing frameworks such as Spark, AWS EMR, and be proficient at feature engineering across various data sets both structured and un-structured. Use Deep Learning models like CNN, RNN and NLP (BERT) for solving various business usecases like name entity resolution, forecasting and anomaly detection. Ability to build ML models across Public and Private clouds including container-based Kubernetes environments.  Work with cross-functional teams to test, implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations  Collaborate with data, design, product and engineering teams to drive effective ML workflows.Basic Qualifications: Advanced Degree in field of Computer Science, Data Science or equivalent engineering discipline.  Minimum 2-3 years of working experience as a data scientist Expertise with Python Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)  Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science", 'Duration:', 'Visa:', ' ', 'Only US citizen/GC holders. No OPT, CPT OR EAD', 'Details:Job Title: Data ScientistDuration: 6+ month contract to hireLocation: Chicago IL Visa: Only US citizen/GC holders. No OPT, CPT OR EAD']

['', 'ManpowerGroup is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)', 'selva.kumar@experis.com', 'Details:', 'Location:', 'Job Title:', 'Please forward updated resume in word format to Selva - selva.kumar@experis.com', 'Selva - selva.kumar@experis.com', "We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our technology team to solve exciting business problems in the domain of commercial banking, payments and financial services. Candidates must have a strong curiosity for data and a proven track record of successfully applying rigorous scientific methods with proficiency in data science knowledge and technical capabilities. This is a unique opportunity to apply your skills and have a direct impact on global business. The ideal candidate will have a strong knowledge of ML, NLP, Deep Learning, Knowledge Graphs and have experience working with massive amounts of data. They should also have strong software engineering skills and the ability to build systems that reach JP Morgan scale.What You'll Do: Develop and Train production grade ML models on large-scale datasets to solve various business usecases for Commercial Banking. Use large scale data processing frameworks such as Spark, AWS EMR, and be proficient at feature engineering across various data sets both structured and un-structured. Use Deep Learning models like CNN, RNN and NLP (BERT) for solving various business usecases like name entity resolution, forecasting and anomaly detection. Ability to build ML models across Public and Private clouds including container-based Kubernetes environments.  Work with cross-functional teams to test, implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations  Collaborate with data, design, product and engineering teams to drive effective ML workflows.Basic Qualifications: Advanced Degree in field of Computer Science, Data Science or equivalent engineering discipline.  Minimum 2-3 years of working experience as a data scientist Expertise with Python Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)  Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science", 'Duration:', 'Visa:', ' ', 'Only US citizen/GC holders. No OPT, CPT OR EAD', 'Details:Job Title: Data ScientistDuration: 6+ month contract to hireLocation: Chicago IL Visa: Only US citizen/GC holders. No OPT, CPT OR EAD']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0Strong interpersonal skills and motivated by impact', 'Responsibilities:', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', 'Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field (eg Math, Economics, Statistics, CS, Engineering)\xa0', 'Prior experience working with data visualization tools (eg Mode, Looker, Tableau, Metabase)\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'General Requirements:', 'Prototype new data-driven features that increase value for our learners, families, and teachers', '3+ years of experience in a data science or analytics role\xa0', 'Create models to identify important segmentations and predict outcomes in specific subdomains\xa0', 'Partner with teammates across the org to translate data into insights and actions\xa0', 'Required Skills: SQL, Python, R, data visualization tools', 'Define and monitor key company-wide success metrics and OKRs\xa0', 'Use visualization, reporting and other tools to improve how our team accesses and interprets datasets\xa0', 'Build data tools that help us scale manual processes\xa0', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests, connecting them with others who share those interests, and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Expert-level SQL skills and proficient in Python or R programming\xa0', 'Data plays an important role in how we make decisions. As our second full-time Data team member, you’ll have an opportunity to work cross-functionally with teammates from Operations, Product, Marketing, and other internal teams as they tackle a variety of challenges and opportunities. You’ll help shape our strategy by sharing key insights, digging into some of our most pressing problems, and finding creative ways to use data to improve our products and services.']

job_title: Customer Facing Data Scientist - Public Sector
job_text: ['', '  Building a long-term trusted relationship with the customer so that the customers can be led towards success   Understanding and empathizing with customers’ pain points of building AI solutions   Qualifying opportunities where DataRobot can be a suitable fit and thus making DataRobot more efficient   Presenting DataRobot in industry conferences as well as creating powerful technical content for marketing purposes  ', '  4-5+ years of real-world business experience in a data science role   Hands-on experience building and implementing predictive models using machine learning algorithms   Strong customer interaction experience   Strong project management skills   Excellent organizational, communication, writing and interpersonal skills   Familiarity with a variety of technical tools for the manipulation of datasets   Fluency with scripting (Python / R)   Up to 50% travel onsite within the Washington, DC area  ', 'Main Requirements', '  Must be a US citizen.  ', ' Leadership ', 'Citizenship And Clearance Requirements', ' Experience dealing with c omplex customer organizations', '  Familiarity with consultative sales process in the analytics marketplace   Familiarity with Hadoop and related Big Data technologies   Experience dealing with c omplex customer organizations', ' Providing data science knowledge and expertise as a trusted advisor to the client ', '  Conducting and managing data science projects with customer’s vision of success in mind   Collaborating with Sales, Field Engineers, and the rest of the DataRobot team to identify the best possible resources to move forward customer’s projects  ', ' Qualifying opportunities where DataRobot can be a suitable fit and thus making DataRobot more efficient ', ' In some cases, executing data science workflows for customers ', ' Conducting and managing data science projects with customer’s vision of success in mind ', ' Representing the DataRobot product from a technical standpoint to customers – including demonstrations, conducting proof-of-concept trials, helping clients evaluate success criteria, and training users ', ' Familiarity with Hadoop and related Big Data technologies ', ' Product ', ' Presenting DataRobot in industry conferences as well as creating powerful technical content for marketing purposes ', ' Familiarity with a variety of technical tools for the manipulation of datasets ', ' Collaborating with Sales, Field Engineers, and the rest of the DataRobot team to identify the best possible resources to move forward customer’s projects ', ' 4-5+ years of real-world business experience in a data science role ', '  Product ', 'Responsibilities', ' Up to 50% travel onsite within the Washington, DC area ', ' Providing the customer’s point of view to DataRobot’s Product team, informing the direction of future product feature development ', ' Understanding and empathizing with customers’ pain points of building AI solutions ', ' Must be a US citizen. ['Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. ', 'Position Description', 'FULL-TIME ', '2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). ', ' ', 'The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. ', 'Position Description ', 'This position is integrated into the development team and responsible for research and development around algorithm strategies, pricing signals, and TCA.  The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'NEW YORK ', 'Required Experience/Skills:', 'Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ', 'Data Scientist', 'Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Required Experience/Skills: ', 'Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. ', 'Familiarity with some or all of these technologies is required - JUnit testing, Unix environment, multi-threaded programming and NoSQL databases.', 'Data Scientist ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. ', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. ']

['Your qualifications are: ', 'You will thrive here if: ', 'LivePerson is a transformational force in how brands and consumers communicate. With over 18,000 brands, including Citi, HSBC, Disney, Verizon, and Home Depot, we are on a mission to make life easier for people and brands everywhere through trusted Conversational AI. We believe in a future where conversations are the norm for getting your intentions fulfilled - whatever they are.  ', 'You believe data-driven decision making is the norm ', '\xa0', 'Strong programming skills in an OO language ', '  ', ' ', 'LivePerson was named to FastCompany’s World’s most innovative companies of 2020 list for the Artificial Intelligence category. We offer top tier tech & data science colleagues, along with opportunities to push your own limits. We embrace invention and experimentation. You’ll have great benefits, flexible time off, plus snacks and drinks to keep your mind fresh and stomach full. Most importantly, you’ll have an ability to make an impact at work and at brands across the globe as we build the future with trusted Conversational AI together. ', 'Deep learning models with internal and external NLP datasets ', 'You see feedback or failure as motivation to learn and to grow ', ' Masters or PhD in Computational Linguistics, Computer Science, ', 'You can operate in a fast paced, dynamic environment ', 'Ability to efficiently write production-quality code ', 'You can build partnerships that move our business forward ', 'NLP techniques to solve problems such as sentence summarization, question answering, sentiment analysis, knowledge extraction and conversational bots ', 'Curiosity and interest in learning new applications and tooling ', 'Delivering deep-learning based algorithms at scale ', 'Production ML evaluation and monitoring performance once completed ', 'Why you’ll love working here: ', 'You relate to our core principles and want to work with Conversational AI experts   ', 'Creating durable, flexible scientific deployment and experimentation capabilities ', 'Your qualifications are:', 'In this role you will:', without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.', '\xa0 ', 'Ability to work closely with teammates in a highly collaborative environment, as well as providing strong individual contributions ', 'Machine Learning tools, models for Natural Language Processing applications, experimental design, research methodologies, qualitative and quantitative analysis ', 'We are an innovative, intent-driven company that believes in building the future and we are looking for growth minded, unconventional thinkers, developers and builders to join the team. ['', '\xa0', 'Sets ego aside in pursuit of finding the best solution, no matter where it comes from.', 'Own both the ML models and the underlying software tooling and infrastructure. Our ML Engineer role combines the classic "ML Scientist" and "Data Engineer" role at other companies.Have a closed feedback loop from hypothesis generation to live AB testing, with no cross-team friction and sub-day iteration cycles.Take on unique modeling challenges not covered in the scientific literature, like extreme positive sample sparsity and labelling delay.Work with modeling techniques at the state-of-the-art of probability prediction, as well as a multitude of other ML areas from NLP to CNNs.Become an expert in Clojure, Go, and the many other cutting-edge open source technologies that maximize our development velocity.Join a nimble, consistently excellent, and experienced engineering team (former Google/LI/Ooyala/etc).', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer at Liftoff, you will:', 'A passion for quality and excellence, and the ability to temper it when necessary to ship.', '2+ years of industry experience applying Machine Learning to large scale problems.', 'Have a closed feedback loop from hypothesis generation to live AB testing, with no cross-team friction and sub-day iteration cycles.', 'Very strong coding ability (experience in Go and Clojure is a plus).2+ years of industry experience applying Machine Learning to large scale problems.Strong core CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, architecting systems).A passion for quality and excellence, and the ability to temper it when necessary to ship.Sets ego aside in pursuit of finding the best solution, no matter where it comes from.Self-motivated and a great ability to hustle.B.S. or higher in Computer Science. PhD a big plus.', 'Work with modeling techniques at the state-of-the-art of probability prediction, as well as a multitude of other ML areas from NLP to CNNs.', 'Self-motivated and a great ability to hustle.', 'Strong core CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, architecting systems).', 'B.S. or higher in Computer Science. PhD a big plus.', 'Become an expert in Clojure, Go, and the many other cutting-edge open source technologies that maximize our development velocity.', 'Take on unique modeling challenges not covered in the scientific literature, like extreme positive sample sparsity and labelling delay.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. Come join our team and help us shape the future of mobile growth!', 'Very strong coding ability (experience in Go and Clojure is a plus).', "At Liftoff, we’re solving one of the core problems faced by every mobile app: growth. To do so,\xa0we build Machine Learning models and infrastructure that can accurately predict which apps a user will like and how to connect them in a compelling way. Our systems operate at a scale unseen outside of the largest Internet companies -- processing over a million requests per second and interacting with over a billion users. Our technology is creative and we have strong product-market fit; as a result, we've already reached profitability and are seeing tremendous growth.", 'Desired qualities and experiences:', 'Own both the ML models and the underlying software tooling and infrastructure. Our ML Engineer role combines the classic "ML Scientist" and "Data Engineer" role at other companies.', 'Join a nimble, consistently excellent, and experienced engineering team (former Google/LI/Ooyala/etc).']

['', 'Applied Cells is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We strive to select the best qualified applicant for any opening and to reward employees based solely on their performance and contribution to the business success of the company. Applied Cells was founded to create revolutionary cell separation and enrichment products. We are helping in battles against cancer by providing tools that are not only capable of isolating rarest tumor cells, but also capable of extracting highest quality cancer fighting immune cells to help achieve better immuno-therapy outcome. We are a team of versatile backgrounds. We come together for the goal of bridging our cross-boundary expertise into making better tools that ultimately help save lives.', 'Key responsibilities include reagent sourcing, cost generation, reagent QC testing, draft product release documents and keep reagent inventory.', 'Minimum bachelor’s in biology disciplines with 3 years post graduate experience. ['Medical Diagnostic Laboratories, LLC is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0\xa0', 'Hold a Ph.D. or M.D./Ph.D. in a relevant discipline with two years’ experience performing wet lab molecular biology procedures.High-complexity Clinical Laboratory Director (HCLD) certification in Molecular Diagnostics from the American Board of Bioanalysis (ABB) is a plus.Demonstrate strong bench skills with routine molecular biology lab techniques such a nucleic acid extraction, nucleic acid QC, PCR and QRT-PCR, molecular cloning, and Sanger DNA sequencing.Experience with NGS platforms (Illumina and Ion Torrent) and NGS library preparation is a requirement.Experience with assay development and validation of molecular assays and troubleshooting support of assays performed by the clinical laboratory.Have a working knowledge of Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) and other relevant regulatory agency standards such as CLIA and CAP.Assist with the generation and updating of laboratory SOPs. Perform and document all specimen test procedures with accuracy, consistency, and timeliness in accordance with laboratory SOPs and regulatory guidelines.Have excellent written, spoken and presentation skills to specialists and non-specialists.Have strong analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.', '\xa0', 'Demonstrate strong bench skills with routine molecular biology lab techniques such a nucleic acid extraction, nucleic acid QC, PCR and QRT-PCR, molecular cloning, and Sanger DNA sequencing.', 'Genesis Research Discovery Institute\xa0(GRDI)\xa0is a member of the Genesis Biotechnology Group (GBG). GBG is a consortium of entities and institutes, in the fields of molecular biology, medicinal chemistry and biotechnology. Our mission is to improve the patient’s quality of life by linking basic science and the development of diagnostic and pre-clinical treatments. We provide clinical laboratory services through a CLIA certified clinical laboratory with multiple state licensing. The laboratory specializes in state of the art; automated DNA based molecular analysis of a variety of chronic and infectious diseases. Our GBG members are also engaged in research and development of complex genetic tests, screening for potential drugs and drug targets, clinical trials and other research and academic collaborations.\xa0', 'Assist with the generation and updating of laboratory SOPs. Perform and document all specimen test procedures with accuracy, consistency, and timeliness in accordance with laboratory SOPs and regulatory guidelines.', 'Hold a Ph.D. or M.D./Ph.D. in a relevant discipline with two years’ experience performing wet lab molecular biology procedures.', 'The\xa0Institute for Biomarker Research, a division\xa0GRDI\xa0has an opening for a\xa0Research Scientist, Next Generation Sequencing\xa0position\xa0to complement its existing assay development efforts in clinical diagnostics. The successful candidate will assist in the development of molecular clinical diagnostic tests and perform routine molecular biology and next-generation sequencing procedures following Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) and Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) in accordance with regulatory guidelines. In addition to assay development and validation, the successful candidate will also provide interpretation, support and troubleshooting of assays performed in a clinical diagnostics setting.\xa0Previous experience with next-generation sequencing platforms is required..\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Life Insurance\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Short and Long Term Disability\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Credit Union\xa0\xa0', 'Requirements:', 'Research Scientist, Next Generation Sequencing\xa0position', 'Have a working knowledge of Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) and other relevant regulatory agency standards such as CLIA and CAP.', 'Experience with NGS platforms (Illumina and Ion Torrent) and NGS library preparation is a requirement.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Legal Plan & Identity Theft Protection\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive Salary\xa0', 'Visit us at\xa0http://www.mdlab.com\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Medical, Dental & Vision Insurance\xa0', 'Have excellent written, spoken and presentation skills to specialists and non-specialists.', 'Genesis Research Discovery Institute\xa0(GRDI)', 'We Offer:\xa0\xa0\xa0', '\xa0Institute for Biomarker Research', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Voluntary Policies (Accident, Hospital Indemnity, Critical Illness & Supplemental STD)\xa0', 'Requirements:\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Business Casual Environment\xa0', 'Experience with assay development and validation of molecular assays and troubleshooting support of assays performed by the clinical laboratory.', 'Have strong analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0401(k) Plan\xa0', 'High-complexity Clinical Laboratory Director (HCLD) certification in Molecular Diagnostics from the American Board of Bioanalysis (ABB) is a plus.', 'We Offer:\xa0', 'GRDI']

['', 'RGP is a global Consulting and Executive Search firm helping some of the most recognized companies in the world work differently. Whether it’s a position in Accounting, Finance, Audit, Tax, Technology, Human Resources or Supply Chain, we understand the challenges in finding the next opportunity on your career path. We will connect you to opportunities that matter, putting your expertise to best use while developing skills for the future.\xa0', 'PURPOSE OF THE ROLE', 'Acquire, ingest, and process data from multiple sources and systems into Big Data platforms to capture value from analytical efforts', 'ATTRIBUTES OF PROFESSIONALS IN THIS ROLE', 'We are energized by the opportunity of identifying and placing top Executive talent.We like working with organizations that are positive, adaptable and growth-minded.We care how work gets accomplished and are deeply invested in the success of our clients and their Executive Professionals.', 'MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or Mathematics6 – 10 years of relevant industry experienceExperience with Python, AWS, Azure, or SparkExperience working in large corporations', 'DESIRED EXPERIENCE AND REQUIREMENTS', 'Foster a culture of sharing, re-use, design for scale stability, and operational efficiency of data and analytical solutions', 'Our Executive Recruiters have established relationships with many of the best and brightest professionals in the industry. Based on our unique approach to recruiting and expertise in assessing opportunities and talent, we have the ability to expose you to the top career opportunities on the market.', 'Experience with Python, AWS, Azure, or Spark', 'MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or Mathematics', 'If this sounds like you, we invite you to read on and learn more.\xa0THE RGP EXECUTIVE SEARCH EXPERIENCEAt RGP, we’re deeply invested in identifying your strengths as an Executive Professional. We understand it’s not simply about finding a position – it’s about your career objectives, goals and aspirations. In other words, it’s about you.\xa0PURPOSE OF THE ROLE', 'Detail oriented\xa0', 'Provide insights to senior leadership based on business and team learnings', 'We care how work gets accomplished and are deeply invested in the success of our clients and their Executive Professionals.', 'Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Experience working in large corporations', 'Acquire, ingest, and process data from multiple sources and systems into Big Data platforms to capture value from analytical effortsProvide insights to senior leadership based on business and team learningsMentor Data Scientist and provide guidance to fellow Data Scientists when necessaryFoster a culture of sharing, re-use, design for scale stability, and operational efficiency of data and analytical solutions', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills\xa0', 'We are energized by the opportunity of identifying and placing top Executive talent.', 'THE RGP EXECUTIVE SEARCH EXPERIENCE', '6 – 10 years of relevant industry experience', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills\xa0Strong analytical skills\xa0Detail oriented\xa0', 'Equal Opportunity EmployerRGP is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, gender, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic information or veteran status, and encourage all applicants to apply.', 'As we continue to grow and deepen our impact on organizations around the world, we are looking for the right people to place in key executive roles. If you are interested in finding the best opportunity on your career path, there are a few things you should know about RGP:', 'As a Principal Data Scientist, you will be responsible for designing, planning, developing, and delivering data science-based products as a part of an integrated team to improve performance of the company’s core operations. job_text: ['Exposure to Graph Databases', 'Excellent verbal/written communication skills, including communicating technical issues to non-technical audiences ', 'At least 2 years as a Big Data Developer on the Hadoop Ecosystem, with experience in data profiling and transformations ', 'Exposure to Spark Streaming and Machine Learning ', ' ', 'Exposure to Data Mining, Data Engineering, and Data Modeling ', 'Preferred Skills: ', 'At least 2 years of experience using Spark core, or Spark SQL, ', 'Exposure to Spark Streaming and Machine Learning Exposure to Data Mining, Data Engineering, and Data Modeling Exposure to Graph Databases', 'Proficient in designing efficient and robust ETL/ELT workflows, schedulers, and event-based triggers ', 'Preferred Skills:', "A Bachelor's degree in a computer related field or equivalent professional experience is required ", 'Strong critical thinking, decision making, and problem-solving skills ', ' Senior Data Engineer - Big Data Focus ', 'Experience with core Java (and/or Scala, Python) ', '\xa0 ', 'Basic Qualifications: ', "At least 2 years as a Big Data Developer on the Hadoop Ecosystem, with experience in data profiling and transformations At least 2 years of experience using Spark core, or Spark SQL, Experience with core Java (and/or Scala, Python) Experience with NoSQL databases such as HBase, Cassandra, or MongoDB Proficient in designing efficient and robust ETL/ELT workflows, schedulers, and event-based triggers Strong critical thinking, decision making, and problem-solving skills Excellent verbal/written communication skills, including communicating technical issues to non-technical audiences A Bachelor's degree in a computer related field or equivalent professional experience is required ", 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Chevy Chase, MD!', 'Experience with NoSQL databases such as HBase, Cassandra, or MongoDB ']

['MS or PhD in Machine Learning, Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or Applied Mathematics.', '3+ years of team leadership experience.', 'Provide technical guidance to product teams on the choice of machine learning approaches appropriate for a task.', "Interos is a product-oriented company. We are building the world's first fully connected knowledge graph of commercial entities to understand global supply chain risk for our customers. The data to do this does not exist, so we are making it.", 'The selected applicants will have the opportunity to lead a team of ML Engineers focused on enterprise network discovery or risk event capture.\xa0They will experiment with large data sets, cutting edge language models, and be supported by a crack team of software engineers and data analysts ready to create the best training data possible and help operationalize your models on AWS infrastructure. This job is a leadership position and you will have significant input into research and product development decisions and serve as a key technical leader within the company.', 'Experience putting ML models into a large high-availability production environment.', 'Demonstrated commitment to building a diverse and inclusive culture.', 'THE OPPORTUNITY', 'Comprehensive Health & Wellness package (Medical, Dental and Vision)10 Paid Holiday Days OffAccrued Paid Time Off (PTO)401(k) Employer MatchingStock OptionsCareer advancement opportunitiesCasual DressOn-site gym and dedicated Peloton room at headquartersCompany Events (Sports Games, Fitness Competitions, Birthday Celebrations, Contests, Happy Hours)Annual company partyEmployee Referral Program', 'Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation, and model implementation.', '10 Paid Holiday Days Off', 'You will contribute to industry-leading-edge projects using your data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence skills to transfer ideas into solutions for some of the most challenging technical problems that will delight customers. You will be a key driver in taking something from an idea to an experiment to a prototype and finally to a live production system.', 'Deep technical skills in machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing with the ability to explain and present deep technical ideas.', '\xa0', 'Good experience creating entity, relationship, and event extraction models', 'Fluency in Python and ML/NLP libraries.', 'Offer technical leadership and mentorship to a small group of ML engineers.Use machine learning, data mining, statistical techniques, and others to create actionable, meaningful, and scalable solutions for business problems.Analyze and extract relevant information from large amounts of data and derive useful insights.Serve as a subject matter expert for natural language processing (NLP) and natural language understanding (NLU), and partner with functional experts across the company to bring that expertise to bear on some of the hardest and most exciting problems in this space.Provide technical guidance to product teams on the choice of machine learning approaches appropriate for a task.Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation, and model implementation.Develop and enhance the predictive capability of in-house developed supply chain risk models for use by some of the biggest enterprises in the world.Work with MLOps to deploy, monitor, and maintain production systems using your models.', 'Interos is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and will consider all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, disability, protected veteran status or any other classification protected by law.', 'Company Events (Sports Games, Fitness Competitions, Birthday Celebrations, Contests, Happy Hours)', 'We need an extraordinary team member who thrives as part of a fast-paced team and takes pride in their ability to succeed while delivering value to our customers. Be challenged by innovation and grow professionally by solving one of the most interesting challenges impacting businesses across the globe.\xa0', 'A passion for creating innovative techniques and making these methods robust and scalable.', 'Accrued Paid Time Off (PTO)', 'Experience putting ML models into a large high-availability production environment.Contributions to open source projects in the NLP/NLU spaceGood experience creating entity, relationship, and event extraction modelsGreat sense of humor.Positive, good natured and generally pleasant to be around.Demonstrated commitment to building a diverse and inclusive culture.A sense of adventure.', 'Interos, founded by Jennifer Bisceglie, is one of the most transformative technologically advanced platforms that powers the global economy supply chain. By using ML and big data, Interos aspires\xa0to dynamically and continuously map all of a company’s business relationships to multiple tiers of dependency on a global scale and endeavors to help customers understand risk in their multi-tier, global supply chains. The scope of this value proposition extends across a variety of different technology sectors including risk management, supply chain intelligence, financial intelligence and cyber-security. Interos has raised $26M in total funding from Venrock, led by Nick Beim, and Kleiner Perkins, led by Ted Schlein. We have 70+ employees and are poised to double in size by end of 2020. Our offices are headquartered in Arlington, VA and we have presence in Menlo Park, CA.', 'Career advancement opportunities', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES', '6+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning, predictive modeling, and analysis.', 'On-site gym and dedicated Peloton room at headquarters', 'BENEFITS', 'Analyze and extract relevant information from large amounts of data and derive useful insights.', 'Develop and enhance the predictive capability of in-house developed supply chain risk models for use by some of the biggest enterprises in the world.', 'A sense of adventure.', 'MS or PhD in Machine Learning, Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or Applied Mathematics.6+ years of hands-on experience in machine learning, predictive modeling, and analysis.3+ years of team leadership experience.Deep technical skills in machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing with the ability to explain and present deep technical ideas.A passion for creating innovative techniques and making these methods robust and scalable.Track record of productionizing ML models.Creative, collaborative, & innovation focused.Fluency in Python and ML/NLP libraries.Experience with transformer and recurrent language models BERT, GPT2, LSTM, Word2VecExperience with databases and data structuring/warehousing.Strong verbal and written communication skills including the ability to interact effectively with colleagues of varying technical and non-technical abilities.', 'Offer technical leadership and mentorship to a small group of ML engineers.', "You want to solve problems for which you can't just Google answers. You want to deal with real big data in actual products that real people use. You want exposure to cutting edge tech, including machine learning at scale, graph databases, and predictive modeling. And you want it all in a high-growth startup.", 'Track record of productionizing ML models.', 'Contributions to open source projects in the NLP/NLU space', 'Experience with databases and data structuring/warehousing.', 'If you are a candidate in need of assistance or an accommodation in the application process, please contact\xa0HR@interos.ai', 'Use machine learning, data mining, statistical techniques, and others to create actionable, meaningful, and scalable solutions for business problems.', 'Experience with transformer and recurrent language models BERT, GPT2, LSTM, Word2Vec', "Interos is looking for world-class machine learning engineers, experts on extracting structured information from unstructured text.\xa0We want to identify real-time risk across every company in our customers' ecosystems and beyond.", 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills including the ability to interact effectively with colleagues of varying technical and non-technical abilities.', 'Employee Referral Program', 'Annual company party', 'Casual Dress', 'STUFF THAT REALLY IMPRESSES US:', 'Serve as a subject matter expert for natural language processing (NLP) and natural language understanding (NLU), and partner with functional experts across the company to bring that expertise to bear on some of the hardest and most exciting problems in this space.', 'Great sense of humor.', 'Work with MLOps to deploy, monitor, and maintain production systems using your models.', 'Comprehensive Health & Wellness package (Medical, Dental and Vision)', 'Stock Options', 'Creative, collaborative, & innovation focused.', '401(k) Employer Matching', 'Positive, good natured and generally pleasant to be around.']

Other duties may be assigned.', '1-2 years in building python data engineering platforms for data science or data analytic groups', '• Experience with Azure or AWS PaaS and SaaS', 'EMAIL:\xa0Farhana.Shaik@harveynashusa.com\xa0', 'KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, ABILITIES:', '1-2 years of web development experience with strong JavaScript skills', '• Communicate technical concepts and solutions in a clear fashion that business stakeholders and other developers can understand and collaborate', '• Design and develop batch jobs, web applications and web services', 'TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', '• System and networking fundamentals', '1-2 years of experience with strong Python development skills1-2 years in building python data engineering platforms for data science or data analytic groups1-2 years of web development experience with strong JavaScript skills', '• Experience with consuming data from streaming platforms like Kafka.', '• ML Modeling is plus', '• Deploy scalable machine learning models to production', '• Strong relational and non-relational data base experience', 'Bachelor’s degree in related field', '• Be accountable and responsible for the accuracy and completeness of assigned work and results', "• Bachelor's degree from an accredited institution", 'Type: Fulltime/ Perm Position\xa0', 'Title: Jr. Data Engineer', '• Prioritize and manage work load and communicate issues clearly', '• Exhibit and practice courteous, ethical and professional behavior while interacting with both internal and external customers']

['', 'Greylock Talent:', 'Due to the volume of applicants we typically receive from our job postings, a follow-up email will not be sent until a match is identified with one of our investments.', "To help support their growth of several investments in SF, I'm looking to network with talented ML Engineers with commercial backgrounds in deep learning. If you have 2+ years of industry experience in applied machine learning with a focus on deep reinforcement learning, curriculum-based learning, and/or computational neuroscience, and I'd welcome the chance to discuss some of these opportunities with qualified applicants.", "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", "I will contact anyone who looks like a potential match--requesting to schedule a call with you immediately. Once contacted, I'll explain our VC Recruiting model, spend some time getting to know you better, and will discuss various startup opportunities within our portfolio with you as well.", 'Application Process:', 'I work for Greylock Partners (one of the top tech investors in the world), and I specialize in ML/DS recruiting for our portfolio of startup investments. Offered as a free/complimentary service, I focus on connecting with top Machine Learning and Data Science talent and making personal referrals / recommendations / introductions into our portfolio. And, on occasion, I sometimes help highly-entrepreneurial candidates (i.e., future founders) connect with members of our investment team as well.']

You thrive in an environment where enormous volumes of data are generated at rapid speed. You’re a creative thinker who likes to explore, and uncover the issues. You are decisive. You understand how propensity models are generated. You are great at influencing up, down, and across groups, and you take satisfaction in mentoring others. Communicating what you’ve uncovered in a way that can be easily understood by others is one of your strengths. You’re not afraid of a challenging assignment and have confidence in promoting your findings at all levels of the organization.', 'Partnering with others to understand business challenges.', 'Modeling experience from conception to production.', 'Degree in mathematics, statistics, physics, engineering, computer science, or economics.', 'Good understanding of Marketing concepts.', 'Good understanding of Financial concepts.', 'When you join Verizon...', 'Understand Pega Systems.', 'You’ll define the analytics strategy and champion that strategy across the business, in order to create buy in for data-driven decision making. You will be working with cross functional teams of marketers, data science enthusiasts and GTS to ensure we deliver models that target specific cohorts of our customers. Prioritize the needs of the marketing department and bring modeling excellence to our deliverables. Challenge the status quo and introduce new technology and techniques to enhance or revenue growth and retention programs. ['', 'Prior experience writing product level code', 'Some exposure and textbook knowledge of Active Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Transfer Learning and/or Meta-Learning.', 'Track record of publishing papers in top Machine Learning journals', 'Develop and fine-tune custom solutions for our clients and convert the gained knowledge into scalable ML products.', 'Be a thought-leader and represent the company at conferences and write blog posts to educate the industry on Alectio’s mission.', 'Alectio is a B2B Machine Learning company, and the first company to offer solutions to help ML experts build ML models with less data - and hence, faster, cheaper, and more sustainably. With people looking to reduce their operational costs more than ever, we are growing fast and expanding to new verticals after an initial focus in autonomous driving and robotics.', 'Nice to have', '\xa0', 'Skills & Experience', "Master's degree of above in either an applied scientific field or in Computer Science.", "Master's degree of above in either an applied scientific field or in Computer Science.An outstanding understanding of theoretical Machine Learning, in particular of Deep Learning.\xa0Experience with modern Machine Learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.Ability to develop Machine Learning models from scratch without relying on an existing librariesSome exposure and textbook knowledge of Active Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Transfer Learning and/or Meta-Learning.At least 3 years of experience developing Machine Learning models with a track record of your work being used in production.At least 5 years of experience writing code in Python, Scala, Java or another language.Ability to learn and adopt new technologies quickly.Soft skills, e.g. team player, clear and concise communication, problem solver, sense of humor.", 'Collarorate with the Engineering team regarding all things Machine Learning; even if you will not be expected to push your models to production on your own, you should be able to develop an end-to-end solution with the support of an engineer.', 'Ability to act as your own product manager and to write your own Product Requirement Documents', 'Working knowledge of Docker', '2-3 years working with data curation and/or Active Learning would be ideal', 'This role could evolve into a leadership/management role if desired.', 'Experience with modern Machine Learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.', 'Responsibilities', 'We are currently looking for a Machine Learning Scientist to join our ML team and help us take our product and algorithms to the next level. Our research is heavily focused on Active Learning, Reinforcement Learning and Meta-Learning. Your work would be a combination of ML research and ML product development (you will not be asked to push models in production on your own, but to apply our algorithm in new, unexpected ways, combine them with state-of-the-art research, etc.) In the longer term, this position can lead to either an applied ML scientist role (with a heavier focus on making ML functional for our users) or an ML researcher role. Our team is small but mighty (12 employees), and virtually everyone is heavily specialized on Machine Learning.', 'An outstanding understanding of theoretical Machine Learning, in particular of Deep Learning.\xa0', 'At least 5 years of experience writing code in Python, Scala, Java or another language.', 'Work closely with the Chief Scientist and the CEO, as well as other members of the Engineering team to design the next generation of ML platform.', 'Work closely with the Chief Scientist and the CEO, as well as other members of the Engineering team to design the next generation of ML platform.Develop and fine-tune custom solutions for our clients and convert the gained knowledge into scalable ML products.Collarorate with the Engineering team regarding all things Machine Learning; even if you will not be expected to push your models to production on your own, you should be able to develop an end-to-end solution with the support of an engineer.Be a thought-leader and represent the company at conferences and write blog posts to educate the industry on Alectio’s mission.In the short-term, you will balance research (including partnerships with top-tier universities) with the development of real-life products. Part of this role consists in writing research papers and conducting research.In the longer-term, this position can evolve either into an ML research role (where your long-term focus will be development of new cutting edge technology and publication in top research journals), or a product development role (where you will implement new technologies as part of the Alectio stack for our customers).This role could evolve into a leadership/management role if desired.', 'In the short-term, you will balance research (including partnerships with top-tier universities) with the development of real-life products. Part of this role consists in writing research papers and conducting research.', 'Ability to develop Machine Learning models from scratch without relying on an existing libraries', 'Ability to learn and adopt new technologies quickly.', 'At least 3 years of experience developing Machine Learning models with a track record of your work being used in production.', 'Soft skills, e.g. team player, clear and concise communication, problem solver, sense of humor.', '2-3 years working with data curation and/or Active Learning would be idealTrack record of publishing papers in top Machine Learning journalsAbility to act as your own product manager and to write your own Product Requirement DocumentsPrior experience writing product level codeWorking knowledge of Docker', 'In the longer-term, this position can evolve either into an ML research role (where your long-term focus will be development of new cutting edge technology and publication in top research journals), or a product development role (where you will implement new technologies as part of the Alectio stack for our customers).']

['Desired Skills/Experience:', '', '• In addition to strong technical skills, the successful candidate must excel in time management; and have a proven track record in problem solution leveraging complex data. • Ideal candidates will have a strong developmental desire to continually learn new technical skills to remain on the cutting edge of capabilities for data analysis and visualization.', 'Spotfire', '• Develop key metrics and data visualizations that will enable prescriptive operations and optimize pipeline processes and transparency through increased data visibility Required Skills/Experience:', '• Strong data analysis skills utilizing tools such as Spotfire, Tableau, Pipeline Pilot, or SQL; API consumption/development experience.', "• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Ag/Life Sciences, or related field", 'Bradford & Galt\xa0is an equal opportunity employer. We will not discriminate, and will take affirmative action measures to ensure against discrimination in employment, recruitment, advertisements for employment, compensation, termination, and other conditions of employment, against any employee or job applicant on the basis of race, color, gender, national origin, age, religion, creed, disability, veteran’s status, or sexual orientation.', "Data-driven strategies are foundational in driving Bayer's R&D (Plant Breeding) pipeline to deliver products from early discovery phase through product launch. This position offers the opportunity to work within Automation and Pipeline Connection (APC). The Data Solutions Associate will be responsible for building powerful, intuitive data visualizations and dashboards that clearly convey the knowledge observed from the data and drive prescriptive operations and centralized seed processing. This role will also be responsible for developing and deploying prototype solutions and working with our IT and data teams to deliver robust solutions in a continuously evolving technical environment.", 'Responsibilities Include:', '• Understanding of Database systems and management of large data sets', '• Experience and skills with project management and communication of strategy with both technical and non-technical audiences. Additional Info: Develop Business Intelligence Visualization SQL R Metrics Create Tools Manipulation Data Acquisition', 'Description', '• Experience working with multidisciplinary research and field teams', '• Ability to construct a storyline, perform analyses, and create presentations to effectively communicate complex concepts and recommendations']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience emulating embedded platforms for live debugging\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong understanding in reading assembly language and using debugging tools\xa0', '\xa0', 'Some of the extras that make working here great\xa0', 'Battelle Cyber:\xa0https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XqMuKsqH9wc\xa0\xa0', 'GitHub:\xa0https://github.com/Battelle\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Software and Intellectual Property development royalty sharing\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mentorship and learning culture\xa0', 'Battelle provides employment and opportunities for advancement, compensation, training, and growth according to individual merit, without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age, genetic information, disability, veteran-status, or any other characteristic protected under applicable Federal, state, or local law.\xa0Our goal is for each staff member to have the opportunity to grow to the limits of their abilities and to achieve personal and organizational objectives. We will support positive programs for equal treatment of all staff and full utilization of all qualified employees at all levels within Battelle.', 'BENEFITS', 'What we need to see from you to join our team\xa0', 'LEGAL DISCLAIMER', 'Battelle’s competitive benefits program includes comprehensive medical and dental care, matching 401K, paid time off, flexible spending accounts, disability coverage, and other benefits that help provide financial protection for you and your family.', "Battelle’s founding mission “to translate scientific discovery and technology advances into societal benefit” is as relevant today as when we opened our doors over 90 years ago. Our science and technology enhance society's well-being and create critical innovations that drive scientific advances for the future. We conduct groundbreaking research and development, design and manufacture leading-edge products, and deliver critical services for commercial and government customers. Our work meets the needs of the nation when it matters most, and Battelle is committed to driving innovation today and for generations to come.", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working with disassemblers such as IDA Pro, Binary Ninja, or radare2\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to\xa0understand\xa0C or C++\xa0', 'Job Description\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Concolic analysis research and implementation\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Active Top Secret Clearance ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Learn (tuition assistance, paid training) and teach (get published, speak at a conference)\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion and drive to constantly need to improve your skill set\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with vulnerability research on one or more operating systems: Android, iOS, Windows, Linux, MacOS, VxWorks, QNX, RTOSs, or other custom operating systems\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of networking fundamentals\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing software to run in user-more or kernel-mode\xa0', 'Do you have a passion for understanding how things work, and ultimately, how they break? Do you enjoy working with discovering vulnerabilities and debugging programs with tools like\xa0gdb\xa0or QIRA? Does creating automated,\xa0scalable\xa0and reverse engineering tools and pipelines excite you? If you answered yes to these questions, this is the job for you!\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to use a scripting language (Python, Perl, Ruby, etc.)\xa0\xa0', 'The above statements are intended to describe the nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this job.\xa0They are not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, activities and skills required of staff members.\xa0No statement herein is intended to imply any authorities to commit Battelle unless special written permission is granted by Battelle’s Legal Department.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience using fuzzing tools such as AFL or Peach\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Internally funded and guided research projects with large amounts of individual autonomy while working from home, if desired, up to 30% time\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with PC and embedded systems architectures such as x86, ARM,     MIPS,\xa0PowerPC\xa0and others.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work individually and in small fast paced team environments\xa0', 'For more information about our other openings, please visit\xa0www.battelle.org/careers', 'Battelle Online\xa0', 'Battelle is seeking a Vulnerability Researcher to join an elite team of Engineers to solve the toughest Computer Science problems in the world. In this role, you will work with disassemblers and debuggers to quickly understand how embedded devices operate. You will use and build vulnerability research tools that push past the edge of current tools and techniques.\xa0In a given\xa0day you will research and debug an embedded device\xa0while getting the chance to bounce ideas off of a close-knit team of researchers. You will get to write tools that fuzz,\xa0concolically\xa0analyze, or process these devices.\xa0We have the tools and the mentors you will need to take yourself to the next level and who are eager to learn from your experience.\xa0We are a not for profit 501c3, which means that we invest in our employees and ideas. We fund internal research and development ideas, we have paid training budgets,\xa0and we have unlimited snacks and coffee. Our work environment is t-shirt/jeans, flexible hours, and once a week we will play together\xa0on a CTF.\xa0', 'Bonus Talents\xa0', 'Battelle Cyber Challenge:\xa0https://battellecyberchallenge.org/\xa0\xa0']

job_title: Big Data NLP and Text Senior Social Scientist-200K plus
job_text: ['· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Deep subject-matter expertise on text modeling. ', 'The Senior Social Scientist for Text and NLP will work closely with the Chief Scientist and the data engineering team to design and implement innovative approaches to extract meaning from web-scale unstructured text. She or he will design protocols for prioritizing sources, evaluating data quality, clustering results, and inferring features of different texts. He or she will also contribute to building out core analytics and approaches to customizing these for each customer. She or he is responsible to the Chief Scientist for the design and continual improvement of text data for our client’s flagship product. ', '\xa0', 'Cell: 703-517-2613 ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ensure that product draws on the best data sources to support its goals and missions by\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 designing and conducting empirical tests of data source quality ', ' ', 'Qualifications', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work closely with data engineering to ensure that new insights, algorithms, and data sources are reflected in production systems. ', 'Salary & Benefits:', 'Preferred Qualifications', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Outstanding communication skills, and proven ability to convey technical findings. ', 'As the Leader in Recruiting Intelligence, The Edens Group, LLC has been retained by a leader in screening tool technology that develops products that analyze large datasets to advance security goals on various issues that include financial threat, insurgency, crime, terrorism, fraud detection and anti-money laundering, organized violence, and illicit trafficking aspects. The company offers a negative media search tool that allows analysts and investigators to perform negative media searches to identify the right customers; and a locator tool that gives law enforcement communities and investigators an ability to identify and locate persons of interest by observing patterns of human behaviors. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Exceptional expertise in natural language processing techniques, methods, and corpora to\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0include structured and unstructured data. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Higher degree in quantitative subject (PhD in economics, statistics, engineering, computer\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 science or like field; MS in data science, statistics, etc.) with focus on applications of\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 machine learning to empirical questions. ', 'Attn: Kelly Edens ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative subject or equivalent experience. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 In collaboration with the data engineering team ensure that product algorithms leverage unstructured data efficiently and consistently. ', 'The Edens Group, LLC ', 'Responsibilities', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provide subject matter expertise on natural language processing techniques and technologies throughout the company. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ensure that product deploys the most appropriate natural language processing algorithms for each task. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Eligible for US Security Clearance. ', '\xa0 ', 'E-mail: kelly@theedensgroup.com ', 'Total compensation package includes a competitive base salary in the $200K range with options and phenomenal benefits. If you thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial, dynamic environment, and enjoy taking ownership and shaping the landscape within a high-growth technology company, we encourage you to send your resume via email to: \xa0 ', 'Salary & Benefits: ', 'Preferred Qualifications ', 'Qualifications ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Exceptional ability to identify and execute empirical tests of ideas. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with technology including Python, SQL, AWS/Azure, Spark. ', "Based upon our Client's growth in the market, we are seeking a Senior Social Scientist for Text and NLP. There are petabytes of text data in thousands of sources across hundreds of languages that could potentially be useful for any screening and vetting challenge. The Senior Social Scientist for Text and NLP is responsible for picking sources and choosing methods to bring the right data to bear and prioritize them appropriately for our client’s product. Which data is most helpful for customers? How do we leverage them? How do we integrate new data sources with existing sources? These are all crucial challenges that the Social Scientist for Text and NLP must solve. ", 'Responsibilities ']

['', 'Building retail data models', 'Using Looker, DBT, Airflow, and or related software', 'Who you are:', '\ufeffExtra Credit:', 'Health, vision, and dental insurance', '\ufeffAbout us:', '\xa0', 'Developing, debugging, and deploying infrastructure within AWS or a similar cloud environmentUsing Looker, DBT, Airflow, and or related softwareBuilding retail data modelsFamiliarity with data governance, HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA', 'A health-and-wellness stipend', 'Of course, all work and no play makes a dull workplace.
