['', 'Strong understanding of digital products, e-commerce economics and strong business acumen.', 'Experience in structuring, cleansing, and preparing large, complex datasets for modeling.', 'This role will start out 100% remote, with no plans to go back to the office yet. This person will be expected to work out of their\xa0 Bellevue office after Covid.We are hiring a Senior Data Scientist in Bellevue, Washington to help build, scale, and improve data models to drive key features and deliver critical insights across our food, home, and lifestyle products. The Senior Data Scientist will be an experienced scientist and leader on the Data Science and Analytics team. They will help advise and create a scalable data models using various modeling or machine learning techniques to support our direct-to-consumer products and apps.\xa0This role will own data modeling solutions that drive specific product features and drive insights in support of our consumer products across mobile, tablets, web, connected TV, voice, and emerging technologies. They will use big data platforms and statistical, econometric, and/or machine learning techniques to enable product capabilities and features beyond what is feasible using heuristics or curation. This senior scientist will ensure the ongoing performance of reliable and ever-improving data models using modern modeling technologies.The ideal candidate will have a proven track record as a data scientist working on NLP and/or machine translation systems. We are looking for Data Scientists to help the team use NLP to categorize, add tagging, and segment content as well as customer feedback. Successful candidates for this role will have a background in a quantitative or technical field, will have experience in NLP and/or machine translation, Customer Segmentation and are comfortable working with large data sets. This person will have a strong point of view but remain open-minded should evidence lead elsewhere. They are a senior member of the team whom others enjoy working with because they are reliable, innovative, and care for their team members. They build trust with people from all areas of the business and have a proven track record. This senior scientist takes end-to-end ownership of their work and consistently delivers results in a fast-paced environment. When their models fail to perform at first, they persist, learn, and iterate to deliver ever improving data models and solutions.\xa0Responsibilities', " Minimum of 7+ years of proven technical experience in data science and modeling. Experience with statistical programming languages, such as Python or R is required Experience with NLP and/or machine translation is required. Experience in structuring, cleansing, and preparing large, complex datasets for modeling. Experience with SQL and other data querying techniques. Experience with Apache Spark and Hadoop is preferred. Experience with Amazon Web Services (Redshift, S3, EC2, EMR, etc.) is preferred. Demonstrated ability to work across product, engineering, and analytics teams to define problems and opportunities in complex or ambiguous areas. Strong understanding of digital products, e-commerce economics and strong business acumen. Demonstrated ability to iterate and improve models both prior to and after they are implemented in production. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Can communicate the results of your work clearly to your audience. Master's in quantitative or technical field (statistics, mathematics, computer sciences, etc.) is a required. PhD in quantitative or technical field (statistics, mathematics, computer sciences, etc.) is a plus. Must have the legal right to work in the United States", 'Partner with other data science teams to share best practices and insights to support ongoing learning.', 'Demonstrated ability to work across product, engineering, and analytics teams to define problems and opportunities in complex or ambiguous areas.', 'Design, build, maintain, and improve data models to deliver customer, product, and marketing features and insights.', 'Hands-on experience leading multiple simultaneous product development initiatives with strong business judgment to make the right decisions about technology, models and methodologies choices.', 'Demonstrated ability to iterate and improve models both prior to and after they are implemented in production.', 'Ensure data integrity and accuracy across all model inputs.', 'Minimum of 7+ years of proven technical experience in data science and modeling.', 'Prepare redundant and scalable data models that efficiently use resources and elegantly handle disruptions.', 'Experience with SQL and other data querying techniques.', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Can communicate the results of your work clearly to your audience.', 'Responsibilities', ' Partner with product, content, engineering, and analytics stakeholders to understand and prioritize data science and modeling can be leveraged to support key business goals and processes. Determine the best modeling approach to solve and automate various problems - finding solutions that effectively balance performance, simplicity, and scalability. Work with engineering and analytics teams to identify scalable, accessible data sources for modeling. Design, build, maintain, and improve data models to deliver customer, product, and marketing features and insights. Solve complex and/or critical problems using data science principles that are highly accurate, stable, scalable, and cost-effective for batch processing as well as real-time use cases. Hands-on experience leading multiple simultaneous product development initiatives with strong business judgment to make the right decisions about technology, models and methodologies choices. Prepare redundant and scalable data models that efficiently use resources and elegantly handle disruptions. Ensure data integrity and accuracy across all model inputs. Partner with other data science teams to share best practices and insights to support ongoing learning. Make data science techniques approachable and understandable to non-data scientists. Support the hiring and development of other data scientists, analysts, and other technical professionals, helping them enhance their skills, while supporting a fun and engaging culture.', 'PhD in quantitative or technical field (statistics, mathematics, computer sciences, etc.) is a plus.', 'Work with engineering and analytics teams to identify scalable, accessible data sources for modeling.', 'Requirements', 'Solve complex and/or critical problems using data science principles that are highly accurate, stable, scalable, and cost-effective for batch processing as well as real-time use cases.', 'Support the hiring and development of other data scientists, analysts, and other technical professionals, helping them enhance their skills, while supporting a fun and engaging culture.', 'Experience with Amazon Web Services (Redshift, S3, EC2, EMR, etc.) is preferred.', 'Experience with statistical programming languages, such as Python or R is required', 'Experience with Apache Spark and Hadoop is preferred.', 'This role will start out 100% remote, with no plans to go back to the office yet. This person will be expected to work out of their\xa0 Bellevue office after Covid.', 'Experience with NLP and/or machine translation is required.', 'Partner with product, content, engineering, and analytics stakeholders to understand and prioritize data science and modeling can be leveraged to support key business goals and processes.', "Master's in quantitative or technical field (statistics, mathematics, computer sciences, etc.) is a required.", 'Must have the legal right to work in the United States', 'Determine the best modeling approach to solve and automate various problems - finding solutions that effectively balance performance, simplicity, and scalability.', 'Make data science techniques approachable and understandable to non-data scientists.']

', ' Experience working with Google Cloud data products (CloudSQL, Spanner, Cloud Storage, Pub/Sub, Dataflow, Dataproc, Bigtable, BigQuery, Dataprep, Composer, etc) Experience with IoT architectures and building real-time data streaming pipelines Experience operationalizing machine learning models on large datasets Demonstrated leadership and self-direction -- willingness to teach others and learn new techniques Demonstrated skills in selecting the right statistical tools given a data analysis problem ', 'Experience with systems monitoring/alerting, capacity planning and performance tuning', 'Expectations']

['', 'Responsibilities of the Change Management Consultant:', 'To be successful in this role you must be able to build strong working relationships, influence and coach leaders, and manage complex, integrated business change projects.', 'Keywords: Change Management Consultant, Project Management, Process Improvement', 'Cultivate solutions that enable better business interactions, problem solving, and decision making', "If you'd like to support an industry leader transition to a culture of continuous improvement, we may have the ideal role for you in Hartford.", 'Due to client requirement, applicants must be willing and able to work on a w2 basis. For our w2 consultants, we offer a great benefits package that includes Medical, Dental, and Vision benefits, 401k with company matching, and life insurance.', 'Job ID: 345272', 'Solid leadership/people management experience and experience working with senior leaders to execute program/initiative', 'Relevant training: Lean Management, Change Management, Decision Effectiveness', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience required", "Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience requiredAt least 5 years of experience in program/project management or process improvement in a complex environmentSolid leadership/people management experience and experience working with senior leaders to execute program/initiativeRelevant training: Lean Management, Change Management, Decision Effectiveness", 'Ensure business leaders and teams have training and support to adopt new framework', 'Drive the adoption of continuous improvement principles, systems, and tools', 'Drive the adoption of continuous improvement principles, systems, and toolsEnsure business leaders and teams have training and support to adopt new frameworkCultivate solutions that enable better business interactions, problem solving, and decision makingCreate customer value through end-to-end process excellence', 'Create customer value through end-to-end process excellence', 'Are you a dedicated Change Management Consultant with experience identifying opportunities and guiding process improvement initiatives?', 'At least 5 years of experience in program/project management or process improvement in a complex environment', 'Requirements of the Change Management Consultant:']

['', '6 years’ experience in software engineering or related field.\xa0', 'Open up our data logs to uncover important patterns.Architect, implement and deploy new data models and data processesCollaborate with product to ideate and unlock features which derive as much actionable information from our data as possible.Stand up infrastructure for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL, Python.Be capable of tackling very loosely defined problems and thrive when working with autonomy in his/her day to day decisions', '• Knowledge of common ML toolkits is preferred', 'Necessary Skills', 'How can we address the challenge?', "Master's degree in Computer Science and 2 years' experience in software engineering or related field.", 'About the Role', 'Open up our data logs to uncover important patterns.', "3 years' experience in data engineering, database engineering, business intelligence, or business analytics.", 'Stand up infrastructure for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL, Python.', 'Problem Statement', 'Architect, implement and deploy new data models and data processes', 'Standing at the center of multiple ecosystems (feature engineering teams, platform teams, data science, product, product analytics) and of course our Walmart customers, the person will', 'We’ve been experiencing unprecedent growths in our digital customer experience touchpoints and we can only expect this trend to accelerate further in the coming months. Finding patterns in engineering data (ex: noticing a pattern where a lot of our userbase is moving to a specific device or browsers, usage of specific phone features, etc...) to enable things like clustering customers for differential customer experience servicing are going to be key for us to excel and win in the post COVID world. Today, we don’t decode the data available at our disposal to generate key and meaningful insights for better forward-looking engineering decisions.', "Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and 4 years' experience in software engineering or related field.\xa0", 'Collaborate with product to ideate and unlock features which derive as much actionable information from our data as possible.', 'OR\xa0', '• Programming in Python or Java + SQL', 'We need to start thinking in terms of treating our Data as a Product to be ahead of the game and catch tech focused leading indicators that are purely generated orthogonal to typical Walmart customer feature products (like Walmart+, WalmartPay, etc..). Artificial Intelligence on tech datapoints will help connect the signals (Appstore reviews, trends in traffic, trends in OPM, device profile, location profile, error trends) to better decode customer needs, preferences, and behaviors so that we be not only proactive but also produce innovative customer experiences. We can get even better at making informed decisions using data-supported strategies and influence key product decisions. Our opportunities are endless as we unlock the power of data – be it in improving our infrastructure efficiency, better operations or meeting the customer with the experience that is tailored and efficient on the platform or device of their choice.', 'The Frameworks team @ Walmart Labs is sourcing for a Technical Lead / Staff Data Engineer to join our team. This eexceptional hire will bridge the divide between Data Engineering and Data Science, pooling the talents and capability of both competencies into one.  ', 'OR', 'Be capable of tackling very loosely defined problems and thrive when working with autonomy in his/her day to day decisions', 'The end goal is to connect the signals and build intelligence so that we can build scalable and efficient engineering solutions.', 'The Ideal Candidate has:', 'At Walmart, we pride ourselves for knowing our customers and connecting with them better than any other company. We interact with our customers across more categories than any company in the world.', 'AND']

['', ' You are a driver. You will be driving technical projects and providing leadership in a ground-breaking and fast-paced environment. This includes task planning and conducting code reviews, as well as individual code contribution.', ' You are a broadly skilled data scientist with experience embedding models into always-on production systems, working across a variety of technologies and data sources.', ' You are you comfortable working on an agile, distributed team spanning multiple time zones and continents.', ' You have an abundance of intellectual curiosity and are enthusiastic to learn (and teach) new technologies / techniques.', " You have a strong sense of data intuition. At our scale, many off-the-shelf modeling techniques (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. You are able to work from first principles and intuition to develop solutions and adapt them to a unique environment.", " You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful machine learning projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the 'why' behind what you are doing.", ' You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful machine learning projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the \'why\' behind what you are doing. You are a driver. You will be driving technical projects and providing leadership in a ground-breaking and fast-paced environment. This includes task planning and conducting code reviews, as well as individual code contribution. You have a strong sense of data intuition. At our scale, many off-the-shelf modeling techniques (open source and enterprise) simply don\'t work. You are able to work from first principles and intuition to develop solutions and adapt them to a unique environment. You are a broadly skilled data scientist with experience embedding models into always-on production systems, working across a variety of technologies and data sources. You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. You work with confidence and without ego. Our data scientists have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done." What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need data scientists who know all the answers; we need data scientists who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked.', 'Who We Are Looking For', ' Our Data Science team is embedded into nearly a dozen individual, mission-focused engineering teams working across a wide spectrum of technological and scientific challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and background, to own problems related to natural language processing and machine learning over hundreds of millions of web pages, graph mining and algorithmic optimization on petabytes of data, and causal inference with missing data - to name a few.', ' You have experience with big data technologies such as Spark or AWS; are able to write efficient SQL; and are proficient in one or more of the following programming languages: R, Python, Java, or Scala. Variety of technical challenge is one of the best things about working at The Trade Desk as a data scientist though which is why we do not expect you to know every technology we use when you start. What we care about is that you can learn quickly and solve complex problems using the best tools for the job.', 'What You Will Be Doing', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists serve both as technical individual contributors and people managers. You will be responsible for owning a technical area as well as building and nurturing a team.', ' You have over 10 years of experience working in a data-driven role, including leading large and impactful technical projects. You may have an advanced degree in a quantitative field, but it’s not a requirement. What and how you can contribute is what’s most important to us which is why our consideration is not limited by the level of education you have.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists serve both as technical individual contributors and people managers. You will be responsible for owning a technical area as well as building and nurturing a team. Lead Senior Data Scientists are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, researching, building, and delivering data-focused products for our clients. Our Data Science team is embedded into nearly a dozen individual, mission-focused engineering teams working across a wide spectrum of technological and scientific challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and background, to own problems related to natural language processing and machine learning over hundreds of millions of web pages, graph mining and algorithmic optimization on petabytes of data, and causal inference with missing data - to name a few. Lead Senior Data Scientists contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and direct people-management, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them.', ' among the best small to medium-sized workplaces ', ' You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making.', ' You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done." What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need data scientists who know all the answers; we need data scientists who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, researching, building, and delivering data-focused products for our clients.', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground.', ' You have an abundance of intellectual curiosity and are enthusiastic to learn (and teach) new technologies / techniques. You are you comfortable working on an agile, distributed team spanning multiple time zones and continents. You are able to communicate effectively across both technical and non-technical audiences. You have over 10 years of experience working in a data-driven role, including leading large and impactful technical projects. You may have an advanced degree in a quantitative field, but it’s not a requirement. What and how you can contribute is what’s most important to us which is why our consideration is not limited by the level of education you have. You have experience with big data technologies such as Spark or AWS; are able to write efficient SQL; and are proficient in one or more of the following programming languages: R, Python, Java, or Scala. Variety of technical challenge is one of the best things about working at The Trade Desk as a data scientist though which is why we do not expect you to know every technology we use when you start. What we care about is that you can learn quickly and solve complex problems using the best tools for the job.', 'What You Bring To The Table', ' You are able to communicate effectively across both technical and non-technical audiences.', ' You work with confidence and without ego. Our data scientists have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and direct people-management, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them.', 'Who We Are']

You will have an immediate impact working on the development, modernization, and continuous testing of key modules/ applications for our client's primary SaaS platform.", '~7 years of development experience using O-O or functional languages ', '~5+ years with SQL and 3 with NoSQL', '~5+ years of experience working within Big Data Tech Stack - Open source: Spark, Kafka, Hadoop, Hive, etc or commercial: Hortonworks, Cloudera) ', 'Long term and Permanent openings ', 'Flexible hiring model -\xa06 months to hire/ Long term Contact or direct hire subject to candidate preference.', 'Committed 2 stage interview process with open slots daily from 17th September', '~7 years of development experience using O-O or functional languages ~5+ years of experience working within Big Data Tech Stack - Open source: Spark, Kafka, Hadoop, Hive, etc or commercial: Hortonworks, Cloudera) ~5+ years with SQL and 3 with NoSQL', '\xa0', 'A committed process with an established client joining a team with existing Signify Technology Candidates', 'Data Engineer - Multiple positions at Senior, Lead and Architect Contract - ', 'Requirements - As we are hiring for II,III and Architect roles, years of exp listed below are general guidelines:', '**Due to the nature of the requirement only candidates able to work within the US without requiring sponsorship will be eligible - please no C2C/ Sub Vendor agencies**\xa0', '100% Remote ', 'Our client are an established Software Company within the healthcare and medical space who are looking to continue growing their Technical Team team following the successful onboarding of our most recent candidates.']

['Take a leadership role in architecting, developing, and deploying a near real time distributed system from the ground upTake an active role in mentoring junior engineersTake ownership from product requirements to productionMake a direct impact on the success of the company', '', 'Make a direct impact on the success of the company', 'Take ownership from product requirements to production', 'A desire to actively shape the engineering culture of a fast growing startup through mentoring', 'Take an active role in mentoring junior engineers', 'At least 3 years of experience developing large-scale distributed systems5+ years of experience with any major programming language in a production environment (Java, Python, etc)A desire to actively shape the engineering culture of a fast growing startup through mentoringA proven track record of success building cloud-based, highly-automated, near real time systemsAn innovative and passionate spirit, an ability to overcome technical issues in a cooperative environment, a commitment to ship quickly, and familiarity with agile software development practicesThe ability to deal with ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and a compassionate understanding of the customer experience', 'A proven track record of success building cloud-based, highly-automated, near real time systems', 'As a member of the Data Platform Engineering team, your job is to build a scalable platform to integrate, sanitize, store and productize our massive store of customer security data. Your platform will handle well over tens-of-billions of security events per day. The output of your platform will keep our customers more secure than ever before, while minimizing the cost of doing so.', 'An innovative and passionate spirit, an ability to overcome technical issues in a cooperative environment, a commitment to ship quickly, and familiarity with agile software development practices', 'Take a leadership role in architecting, developing, and deploying a near real time distributed system from the ground up', 'We’d like to speak with you if you have ...', 'The ability to deal with ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and a compassionate understanding of the customer experience', 'You will ...', 'We’re a team of talented engineers and security professionals. ['', ' Experience in cell-based and immunochemical techniques, including flow cytometry and immunoassays is highly preferred.', ' Authoring protocols and reports. Previous leadership experience (coaching, mentoring, leading projects) is preferred. Knowledge of drug development, particularly, related to residual DNA impurities is required. Experience with and knowledge of molecular biology and techniques is a must. Experience with method development in a variety of qPCR and/or molecular based methods is required. The ability to communicate ideas and influence others is essential. Maintain awareness of the current literature relevant to methods Writing analytical sections of regulatory submissions is encouraged. job_text: ['', ' Design, develop and validate machine learning and AI models for novel medical applications. ', ' Excellent presentation and communication skills to diverse audiences ', ' Be a hands on coach/player type leader  Solve some of the most complex problems in healthcare, translating complex data into meaningful insights  Design, develop and validate machine learning and AI models for novel medical applications. Consistently execute against a product roadmap to deliver multiple features  Collaborate with Senior Management and major stakeholders to establish and communicate a technical vision for the solution  Productionize data science methods, algorithms and workflows into existing/new products  Work directly with our team comprised of the brightest minds in technology, research and life sciences ', ' Solve some of the most complex problems in healthcare, translating complex data into meaningful insights  Provide support functions around model-building, including data cleaning and code review  Proven technical leadership regarding feature design, enhancement and implementation of complex data science software solutions  Provide support functions around model-building, including data cleaning and code review  Ability to understand and peer review complex, multivariable statistical models and data analytics solutions using machine learning algorithms  Ability to work independently on complex and diverse issues and propose solutions  Proven leadership scaling application development teams that are self-organizing, loosely coupled, yet highly aligned.  Ability to translate business challenges into data pipelines & model framework, owning and driving successful projects  Work directly with our team comprised of the brightest minds in technology, research and mathematics as well as senior interfaces from leading life sciences companies across the globe ', ' Demonstrated leadership in software engineering and developing data science products into software applications ', ' Proven technical leadership regarding feature design, enhancement and implementation of complex data science software solutions ', ' Expertise in Natural Language Processing, signal processing and/or image processing a plus ', ' Strong verbal and written communication; collaborative focus ', ' Solve some of the most complex problems in healthcare, translating complex data into meaningful insights ', 'Your Education & Experience', ' 4+ years of experience with predictive analytics in a healthcare related field ', ' Collaborate with Senior Management and major stakeholders to establish and communicate a technical vision for the solution ', ' Proven leadership scaling application development teams that are self-organizing, loosely coupled, yet highly aligned. ['', "They are creating the ultimate, holistic experience where you can backtrack on meetings, give it commands on what you’re looking for, and move on. For example, say you want to replay a meeting you attended or missed, and only want to see the parts where your direct manager is speaking. It will throw back each case where your manager is talking. What about when two certain people are arguing about a certain topic? Done. Who sneezed at this particular time? Got it. Basically anything you need, it will retrieve. This is where they hope to change productivity in the workplace - by letting the machines do what they're best at (memorizing, retrieving, etc.)! ", 'This early stage startup is challenging the traditional approach to video conferencing and meetings in general.\xa0 ', '3+ years of hands-on experience crafting and experimenting with neural networks, machine learning techniques and computer vision ', 'Requirements:\xa0', ' ', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineers ', 'Fluent with Python, as well as experience with packages such as NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, and matplotlib. ', 'Location:\xa0', 'Requirements:\xa0 ', 'Location:\xa0San Francisco ', 'PhD/Masters in Computer Science or related fields ', 'San Francisco', '3+ years of hands-on experience crafting and experimenting with neural networks, machine learning techniques and computer vision Fluent with using a neural network framework such as TensorFlow and PyTorch Fluent with Python, as well as experience with packages such as NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, and matplotlib. PhD/Masters in Computer Science or related fields ', "Have you ever been to an unproductive zoom meeting, or perhaps, missed a really important one? The company's\xa0platform is making sure you have the liberty to do what you need to do, while getting the most out of every meeting too! Statistics show that half of people attending meetings are actually not essential to the immediate task at hand; they only show up because of the “fear of missing out” on something “important”. As you know, this only creates inefficiencies all around the workplace.\xa0 ", 'About:', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineers', '\xa0 ', 'Fluent with using a neural network framework such as TensorFlow and PyTorch ', 'About: ', "Please apply directly to this posting if you'd like to learn more!", 'The CTO is looking for seasoned ML Engineers interested in utilizing AI to develop the next generation real-time communications platform. ']

['', 'The successful candidate should be experienced as a Lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager. Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', 'Key Requirements:', '• Working and communicating across a fast-paced cross organizational team.', '• Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.', 'The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2.', '• Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required.', 'Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical.\xa0', 'We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities.\xa0', '• Attention to detail to ensure chain of custody of all samples.', '• Ability to follow laboratory specified documentation practices', '• Work with samples which may contain SARS-CoV-2.', 'The Research Associate is also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or techinal issues.', '• Ability to handle human specimens with appropriate precautions', '• Experience working with lab automation (e.g. Agilent Bravo; Integra ViaFlo, AssistPlus) preferred.', '• California licensure as Clinical Laboratory Scientist (CLS) or Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT).', '• Ability to follow CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) procedures', 'Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma.\xa0', '• Experience working in a Biological Safety Cabinet required.', '• Clinical diagnostics background preferred.', 'Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures.\xa0', "Scientific Bachelor's degree preferred.", '• Work with human biological specimens. HepB Vaccination advised.', '• Experience working in a CLIA or GLP environment preferred.']

', 'Thorough knowledge and experience in formulating and presenting solutions to technical audiences and readerships.', 'Advanced knowledge and extensive experience in computer programming to include the ability to write, test, and edit code in Java, Java Script, HTML, SQL, and XML. ', 'Internal Applicants: ', ' Free basic life and disability insurance ', ' Collaborate on projects with team members, Design Agency and Production Agency engineers, other laboratory computing organization, and other DOE laboratories doing similar work. ', ' Regular position: ', 'Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter, which typically includes US citizenship and being at least 18 years of age.', 'Thorough knowledge and experience with hardware and operating systems including system architectures, network infrastructures, and client server principles.', ' Learning opportunities and tuition assistance ', 'Advanced knowledge of software engineering, research, design, and development methodologies, tools and processes to include software development methodology framework, source code control, application development tools and techniques, database design, and component integration.Thorough understanding of the Principles of Scientific Integrity. Thorough knowledge and experience in developing and implementing technical research and development projects, including the formulation and testing of hypotheses, investigation of alternative solutions, and recommendation of solutions to technical problems.Thorough knowledge and experience in formulating and presenting solutions to technical audiences and readerships.Experience developing innovative advanced concepts, theories, methods, techniques and approaches to address specialized problems. Experience applying scientific principles, techniques, methods and tools to provide solutions for an extensive and diverse range of complex and/or ambiguous problems where analysis of situations or data requires in-depth evaluation of variable factors.Experience in designing and developing new methods, techniques or approaches to address critical technical problems, using creativity in applying standard practices and procedures, and leading technical decisions, including selections of technical alternatives. Advanced knowledge and extensive experience in computer programming to include the ability to write, test, and edit code in Java, Java Script, HTML, SQL, and XML. Thorough knowledge and experience with hardware and operating systems including system architectures, network infrastructures, and client server principles.Experience with customizing COTS applications and configuring graphical user interfaces (GUI).Demonstrated ability to analyze existing programs or formulate logic for new systems, use the scientific method to understand program performance, devise procedures, use algorithms, perform coding and test/debug programs, and prepare supporting documentation.Demonstrated experience in the software development and sustainment lifecycle to include design, development, modification, testing, debugging, evaluation of software to meet technical and functional requirements, maintenance, and decommissioning of software. Experience contributing to the development of technical standards.Thorough knowledge and experience with hardware and operating systems including system architectures, network infrastructures, and client server principles.', 'Eligibility requirements: To obtain a clearance, an individual must be at least 18 years of age; U.S. citizenship is required except in very limited circumstances. See DOE Order 472.2 for additional information.', 'Working knowledge or familiarity with Mechanical Computer-Aided Design (MCAD) and/or Electrical Computer-Aided Design (ECAD) tools.', ' Lead and work as part of a team to research and develop new integrated search tools for the Weapons IT portfolio of systems, enabling scientists and engineers to locate documents and data on the full array of weapons data systems. ', ' Support the research and development (R&D) of the software and system needs of the weapons organizations as it relates to managing content on the unclassified and classified networks.  Lead and work as part of a team to research and develop new integrated search tools for the Weapons IT portfolio of systems, enabling scientists and engineers to locate documents and data on the full array of weapons data systems.  Research, evaluate, and make recommendations around the implementation of new or existing software features and emerging technologies.  Collaborate on projects with team members, Design Agency and Production Agency engineers, other laboratory computing organization, and other DOE laboratories doing similar work.  Provide technical direction and/or coordinate activities with team members and other relevant personnel to analyze, design, develop, configure, test, verify, validate, and implement engineering application tools.  Integrate enterprise-wide technical solutions in support of expanded mission capabilities.  Develop the technical approach, using creativity in applying standard practices and procedures, and lead technical decisions, including selections of technical alternatives for assigned work.  Promote a mutually respectful work environment that is free from discrimination and harassment supports cooperation, teamwork, and resource sharing.  Maintain state-of-the-art technical expertise and knowledge within discipline, and develop new skills in related disciplines. May attain additional certifications and/or qualifications, which may include more advanced educational degree. ', ' Development experience in the PTC ThingWorx Industrial Innovation Platform. ', 'Additional Details', ' Provide technical direction and/or coordinate activities with team members and other relevant personnel to analyze, design, develop, configure, test, verify, validate, and implement engineering application tools. ', 'For full consideration, applicants must submit a comprehensive cover letter that addresses how they meet the minimum job requirements, and any of the desired requirements of the position.This position requires a Q clearance and the ability to obtain Sigma 15 authorization. Applicants must have the ability to obtain a DOE Q clearance, which normally requires US citizenship.Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter, which typically includes US citizenship and being at least 18 years of age.This position will be subject to random polygraph and drug testing.']

job_title: Senior Data Science and Analytics. - Boston
job_text: ['', 'Celebrus will be a key enabler of the personalization strategy through potential expansion to paid digital ads, social marketing partners, bank email messages through salesforce tagging and more.', ' The role would also help remediate the process for managing the ongoing process of digital data collection through the VTIM and Celebrus technology teams in cooperation with Bank technology PMs.', 'Project Overview', ' Ability to navigate complicated client eco-system of stakeholders', ' Candidate should be proactive, a quick learner and be able to deal with ambiguity and drive towards clarity.', ' Background in data analytics and data strategy strongly preferred', ' We are looking for Manager+ and appreciate information on suggested', ' Strong consulting skills, ability to influence and work independently with limited oversight', ' Understanding of data, web analytics, reporting/BI, and MarTech ecosystem components would be important but they don’t need to be an expert (like an architect or SME on Coremetrics or Celebrus).', ' The role is part strategic (thinking of how functionality dependent on Coremetrics will be migrated to leveraging Celebrus and integrated with overall MarTech ecosystem), part planning (how the migration items are prioritized and why) and part delivery execution (how the prioritized items are delivered and BAU/operations are transitioned).', ' Strong consulting skills, ability to influence and work independently with limited oversight Ability to navigate complicated client eco-system of stakeholders Background in data analytics and data strategy strongly preferred We are looking for Manager+ and appreciate information on suggested', ' The role requires good client communication and facilitating skills, ability to influence others and gain consensus, and team collaboration.', ' For 2020, the goal would be to do the business risk assessment for Coremetrics to get sunset and what needs to happen with respect to prioritization for Celebrus', 'Job Summary', ' The role should contribute to the ongoing development of the personalization/orchestration program by auditing existing applications of Coremetrics, taking this baseline and identifying ways to enhance bank capabilities directly and indirectly within the martech ecosystem.', ' The primary task is to help the bank sunset Coremetrics by way of completion of Celebrus implementation and integrating its data across the bank’s martech, analytics, and broader sales / servicing ecosystems. For 2020, the goal would be to do the business risk assessment for Coremetrics to get sunset and what needs to happen with respect to prioritization for Celebrus The role would also help remediate the process for managing the ongoing process of digital data collection through the VTIM and Celebrus technology teams in cooperation with Bank technology PMs. The role should contribute to the ongoing development of the personalization/orchestration program by auditing existing applications of Coremetrics, taking this baseline and identifying ways to enhance bank capabilities directly and indirectly within the martech ecosystem.Celebrus will be a key enabler of the personalization strategy through potential expansion to paid digital ads, social marketing partners, bank email messages through salesforce tagging and more. The role is part strategic (thinking of how functionality dependent on Coremetrics will be migrated to leveraging Celebrus and integrated with overall MarTech ecosystem), part planning (how the migration items are prioritized and why) and part delivery execution (how the prioritized items are delivered and BAU/operations are transitioned). The role requires good client communication and facilitating skills, ability to influence others and gain consensus, and team collaboration. Candidate should be proactive, a quick learner and be able to deal with ambiguity and drive towards clarity. Understanding of data, web analytics, reporting/BI, and MarTech ecosystem components would be important but they don’t need to be an expert (like an architect or SME on Coremetrics or Celebrus).', ' The primary task is to help the bank sunset Coremetrics by way of completion of Celebrus implementation and integrating its data across the bank’s martech, analytics, and broader sales / servicing ecosystems.']

['', 'Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.', 'Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required.', 'Work with human biological specimens. HepB Vaccination advised.', 'Ability to follow laboratory specified documentation practices', 'The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2.', 'Ability to follow CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) procedures', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience working in a CLIA or GLP environment preferred.', '\xa0', 'California licensure as Clinical Laboratory Scientist (CLS) or Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT)', 'Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures.', 'Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical.\xa0', 'Experience working with lab automation (e.g. Agilent Bravo; Integra ViaFlo, AssistPlus) preferred.', 'We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities.\xa0', 'Clinical diagnostics background preferred.', 'Working and communicating across a fast-paced cross organizational team.', 'Excellent employment opportunity for a Research Associate in the South San Francisco, CA area.', 'Work with samples which may contain SARS-CoV-2.', 'Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', 'Ability to handle human specimens with appropriate precautions', 'Experience:', 'Should be experienced as a lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager.\xa0', 'Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma.\xa0', 'Also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or Technical issues.', '.', 'Experience working in a Biological Safety Cabinet required.', 'Attention to detail to ensure chain of custody of all samples.']

['', '# of Positions', 'Classification', 'Job Code #', 'Department Information', 'Job Type', 'Working Title', 'Work Location', ' Duty Statement ', " The Healthcare-Associated Infections (HAI) Program is one of two programs in the Center for Health Care Quality of the California Department of Public Health. The Program was created by mandate to oversee the prevention, surveillance, and reporting of healthcare-associated infections in California's general acute care hospitals. HAIs are the most common complication of hospital care. Since 2010, the HAI Program has produced annual public reports of hospital HAI data to inform choices of healthcare consumers and prompt providers to take actions to prevent infections; actively engaged in HAI prevention by performing site visits to hospitals with high infection rates, convening prevention collaboratives, and providing infection prevention education; and provided consultation and assistance to local public health for infection outbreaks that occur in healthcare facilities. The vision of the HAI Program is to eliminate HAIs for all Californians.", 'Position #(s)', 'Position Details', 'Job Description And Duties', ' Epidemiologist II ']

['', 'Qualifications:', 'Strong track record in applying modern synthetic organic techniques to advance small-molecule drug discovery programs, include a strong publication/patent record', 'Ideaya is an equal opportunity employer. In accordance with applicable law, Ideaya does not discriminate in hiring or otherwise in employment based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, marital or veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected status. EOE/AA/Vets.', 'Benefits:', 'IDEAYA Biosciences (NASDAQ: IDYA) is a public, clinical-stage oncology-focused precision medicine company committed to the discovery and development of targeted therapeutics for patient populations selected using DNA sequencing and other molecular diagnostics. Our approach integrates extensive capabilities in identifying and validating translational biomarkers with small molecule drug discovery to select patient populations most likely to benefit from the therapies we are developing. We are applying these capabilities across multiple classes of precision medicine, including direct targeting of oncogenic pathways and synthetic lethality – which represents an emerging class of precision medicine targets. We believe this diversified approach will enable us to deliver the right medicine to the right patient to drive a more robust clinical response.', 'We are seeking a talented and highly motivated individual with significant pharmaceutical industry experience to join our multidisciplinary team. The successful candidate will engage in rational structure-based drug discovery enabled by our computational and structural chemistry group. In addition to significant lab work, the work will include aspects of managing CRO collaborators in the preparation of target molecules and chemistry leadership of drug discovery projects. As a member of a dynamic multi-disciplinary team, this person will collaborate with a broad group of scientists within IDEAYA as well as external collaborators.', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Experience in applying molecular modeling methods to structure, ligand and fragment-based drug discoveryA strong record of delivering portfolio success and driving projects through to the identification of high quality small molecule drug candidatesExcellent awareness of current developments in synthetic and medicinal chemistry, and ability to identify opportunities to advance the science in these fields', 'Ph.D. in synthetic organic chemistry with 3 -7 years pharmaceutical medicinal chemistry industrial experienceExpert understanding of medicinal chemistry concepts and proficiency in the application of structure-based design with demonstrated success in application to medicinal chemistry design challengesStrong track record in applying modern synthetic organic techniques to advance small-molecule drug discovery programs, include a strong publication/patent recordExceptional knowledge of ADME, physicochemical, biochemical and pharmacological principles as applied to drug discoverySolid ability to supervise junior scientists and/or CRO collaborators to high levels of productivityExcellent oral and written communication skillsAbility to multi-task and set priorities on multiple projectsAbility to work well in multi-disciplinary teams', 'Excellent awareness of current developments in synthetic and medicinal chemistry, and ability to identify opportunities to advance the science in these fields', 'Ability to work well in multi-disciplinary teams', 'Experience in applying molecular modeling methods to structure, ligand and fragment-based drug discovery', 'IDEAYA recently announced a landmark strategic partnership with GSK in Synthetic Lethality for certain pipeline programs. The GSK partnership is transformative and enables IDEAYA and GSK to collectively build an industry leading platform and pipeline in Synthetic Lethality. For more information, please see\xa0www.ideayabio.com.', 'Preferred Requirements:', 'About IDEAYA Biosciences:', "When you're at IDEAYA, you will be in the midst of brilliant minds working on precision medicine therapies to help cancer patients. We are passionate and committed about being on the forefront of oncology medicine, which means we all have a high internal drive that is at the very core of every person at IDEAYA. We are inquisitive, ask deep questions, and are data-driven innovators who like to collaborate and use team work to move science forward.", 'Ability to multi-task and set priorities on multiple projects', 'The Opportunity:', 'Expert understanding of medicinal chemistry concepts and proficiency in the application of structure-based design with demonstrated success in application to medicinal chemistry design challenges', 'Solid ability to supervise junior scientists and/or CRO collaborators to high levels of productivity', 'A strong record of delivering portfolio success and driving projects through to the identification of high quality small molecule drug candidates', 'Exceptional knowledge of ADME, physicochemical, biochemical and pharmacological principles as applied to drug discovery', 'Ph.D. in synthetic organic chemistry with 3 -7 years pharmaceutical medicinal chemistry industrial experience']

['', 'Working Conditions: Works in a normal office setting with no exposure to adverse environmental conditions. Provide on-call support for database application and layered products as needed. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Collaborate with business partners to productionize, optimize, and scale enterprise analytics. ', 'The Sr. Big Data Engineer manages the uninterrupted flow of information by designing and maintaining data pipelines to deliver data across our organization. S/he builds the automated data pipelines to ingest and prepare the data to meet the reporting and analytics needs of the organization. This includes building and maintaining the data structures and architectures for data ingestion, processing and deployment for large-scale, data-intensive applications. This individual must ensure that optimal ETL (Extract, Transformation, and Load) solutions are developed by applying best practices to the data modeling, code development and automation. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Keen attention to detail and ability to access impact of design changes prior to implementation ', '\xa0', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Collaborate with data architects and modelers on data store designs and best practices ', ' ', 'Position Summary ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to present and explain technical information to diverse types of audiences in a way that establishes rapport and gains understanding ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++ ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Thorough understanding of relational, columnar and NoSQL database architectures and industry best practices for development ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Self-driven, highly motivated and ability to learn quick ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work experience with geospatial data and spatial analytics is preferred ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Excellent advanced SQL coding and performance tuning skills ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Understanding of agile development methodologies ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 As part of an agile team, design, develop and maintain an optimal data pipeline architecture using both structured data sources and big data for both on-premise and cloud-based environments. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 At least two (2) years Data engineering experience on the Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), or Snowflake ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with parsing data formats such as XML/JSON and leveraging external APIs ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills; ability to weigh various suggested technical solutions against the original business needs and choose the most cost-effective solution ', 'Position Title: Sr Big Data Engineer \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Other Skills/Abilities ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Science, Math or related discipline ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Participate in requirements gathering sessions to distill technical requirements from business requests. ', '\xa0 ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop and automate ETL code using scripting languages, ETL tools and job scheduling software to support all reporting and analytical data needs. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data pipeline performance, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability and access to information. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong customer service orientation ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provide off-hours support for all developed data pipelines in an on-call rotation. ', 'Education/Certifications ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Design and build dimensional data models to support the data warehouse initiatives. ['', 'Prior experience as a quantitative researcher at a quantitative investment firm/hedge fund is a big plus', 'Responsibilities:', 'PhD preferably in statistics, computer science, engineering, physical sciences, economics or related technical field', 'Excellent communication skills – Must be able to articulate their analysis and methodologies clearly and communicate insights in an easily accessible way to the team', 'Passionate about disrupting an entire industry within the private investment markets', 'Experience putting models into production systems is a huge plus', 'Develop innovation to find and use data that significantly delivers impact against our key business metrics', 'Build causal and interpretable models', 'Requirements:', 'Build reproducible backtests for proposed models / algorithms', 'Must be excited about working in a fast and changing environment where solutions have not been already defined', 'The Senior Quantitative Researcher will be responsible for identifying winning portfolio brands that CircleUp’s private equity business will invest in for a new fund raise. This person will lead the design, discovery, and delivery of portfolio companies that represent high growth and successful outcomes for CircleUp and it’s Limited Partners. To do this, the Quantitative Research leader will leverage our comprehensive knowledge graph of data and insights that harnesses the power of machine learning. This individual will also play a very visible part in driving confidence and conviction in Limited Partners who seek to invest in our fund through data science, backtesting analysis and strong communication skills. You will be working closely with data scientists, the GM of Equity, product managers, and investors. Prior experience with financial investment research is critical. This role will report to the Chief Product Officer.\xa0\xa0', 'Be able to evaluate new and existing data pipelines to develop, design and deliver analysis that drives conviction in systematic investment portfolio decisions\xa0', 'Extensive background in finance or investment research\xa0', 'Strong work ethic and courage to overcome meaningful obstacles', "If you got to this point, we hope you’re feeling excited about the job description you just read! Even if you feel that you don't meet all of the requirements and qualifications, we still encourage you to apply. We’re eager to speak with those who share our passion to help entrepreneurs thrive - not just those who match every bullet point in our job descriptions.\xa0", 'Lead the R&D for quantitative analytics that inform portfolio selection of winning CPG brands', 'CircleUp is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religious creed, color, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital status (including registered domestic partnership status), sex and gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), gender identity and gender expression (including transgender individuals who are transitioning, have transitioned, or are perceived to be transitioning to the gender with which they identify), age, sexual orientation, Civil Air Patrol status, military and veteran status and any other consideration protected by federal, state or local law. We encourage those who really want to make an impact to apply for our open positions.', 'Build end to end algorithms for assessing early stage consumer companies for growth equity investments', 'Operates with unassailable integrity', 'Ability to write code in at least one scripting language, preferably Python', 'CircleUp is a technology company on a mission to help entrepreneurs thrive by giving them the capital and resources they need. We have built Helio, our machine learning and predictive analytics platform to discover the fastest-growing companies in the consumer products sector. Helio allows us to uncover data and insights that enable faster, smarter decisions for our capital offerings by investing in a “systematic” fashion. We’re now scaling these capabilities beyond our existing discretionary private venture fund. We are looking for a Quantitative Research expert to lead our mission to create a fully systematic investment solution for the private venture markets.', 'Lead the R&D for quantitative analytics that inform portfolio selection of winning CPG brandsBe able to evaluate new and existing data pipelines to develop, design and deliver analysis that drives conviction in systematic investment portfolio decisions\xa0Build end to end algorithms for assessing early stage consumer companies for growth equity investmentsBuild causal and interpretable modelsBuild reproducible backtests for proposed models / algorithmsWork cross functionally with data science, engineering, product, and business development to help decide & prioritize building systematic data pipelines and insightsDevelop innovation to find and use data that significantly delivers impact against our key business metricsRepresent CircleUp as subject matter expert leading systematic investment strategy in fundraising activities', "CircleUp was recently honored as one of Fast Company's Top 10 Most Innovative Companies in Data Science and has been named a CB Insights FinTech 250, a Top 5 Most Disruptive Company in Finance by CNBC, and to the Forbes FinTech 50. Founded in 2012, CircleUp is headquartered in San Francisco and backed by Union Square Ventures, GV, Canaan Partners, QED Advisors, and others.", 'Experience with machine learning', 'Prior experience as a quantitative researcher at a quantitative investment firm/hedge fund is a big plusPhD preferably in statistics, computer science, engineering, physical sciences, economics or related technical fieldExtensive background in finance or investment research\xa0Excellent communication skills – Must be able to articulate their analysis and methodologies clearly and communicate insights in an easily accessible way to the teamMust be excited about working in a fast and changing environment where solutions have not been already definedPassionate about disrupting an entire industry within the private investment marketsAbility to write code in at least one scripting language, preferably PythonExperience with machine learningExperience putting models into production systems is a huge plusOperates with unassailable integrityStrong work ethic and courage to overcome meaningful obstacles', 'Represent CircleUp as subject matter expert leading systematic investment strategy in fundraising activities', 'Work cross functionally with data science, engineering, product, and business development to help decide & prioritize building systematic data pipelines and insights']

['A-Alpha Bio’s Mission', '', '\xa0Preferred', 'Experience with DNA encoded libraries (yeast display, phage display, yeast-two-hybrid)', 'Strong statistics and data science skills in Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, SciPy)', 'A-Alpha Bio is a seed-stage biotech startup commercializing cutting edge synthetic biology tools enabled by next generation sequencing for improved drug discovery and development. We spun out of the University of Washington’s Institute for Protein Design and Center for Synthetic Biology in 2018 after patenting and publishing our AlphaSeq platform for high-throughput protein interaction characterization. Since closing our seed financing in September 2019, we have focused on partnering with pharmaceutical companies to discover and optimize drugs for therapeutic areas ranging from infectious disease to cancer. We have been growing rapidly and new members of the team should expect a fast-paced and highly dynamic work environment. We are building a diverse, meritocratic, and supportive team that values hard work, creativity, transparency, individual and team growth, flexibility, and kindness.', 'Strong written and oral communication skills', 'Experience with protein engineering, antibody engineering, and drug discovery', 'Ph.D. in Life/Chemical/Physical/Engineering SciencesImpressive technical track record at top-tier academic institutions or companiesSynthetic biology experience and strong molecular biology skillsSelf-motivation, intellectually curiosity, and excitement to carry out interdisciplinary research involving complex experimental and bioinformatics pipelinesAbility to take initiative, multi-task, prioritize, adapt rapidly to changes, and work collaboratively as part of a team with diverse experiences and skill levelsStrong written and oral communication skills', 'Lead and participate in technical and strategy meetings and assist in decision making with recommendations based on data gathered internally and from the literature', 'Lead, manage and execute R&D projects for external partners, collaborators, and funding agenciesDesign, manage, and execute internal R&D programs to expand and optimize AlphaSeq for drug discovery applicationsLead and participate in technical and strategy meetings and assist in decision making with recommendations based on data gathered internally and from the literatureTransfer developed and optimized processes to the Production Team; write and revise process documentation and assist with protocol transferPresent scientific findings to the A-Alpha Bio team and to external partnersMentor, train, and manage junior members of the R&D and Production TeamsAuthor detailed, accurate, and accessible documentation of experiments and dataStay current with scientific literature and present to the team on relevant topics', 'Lead, manage and execute R&D projects for external partners, collaborators, and funding agencies', 'Mentor, train, and manage junior members of the R&D and Production Teams', 'Technical proficiency with at least 1 macromolecular modeling suite, preferably Rosetta', 'Ph.D. in Life/Chemical/Physical/Engineering Sciences', 'Transfer developed and optimized processes to the Production Team; write and revise process documentation and assist with protocol transfer', 'Qualifications', 'Role Description', 'A-Alpha Bio is located in Seattle at Fluke Hall, a startup incubator operated by the University of Washington. While the startup lifestyle occasionally requires grueling hours, we strongly value the need for a work-life balance and time out of the lab/office. We are fortunate to be situated in a region that is renowned for its premier outdoor activities, including hiking, biking, climbing, skiing, kayaking, and sailing.', 'Familiarity with next-generation sequencing platforms, including sample preparation and analysis for Illumina and Oxford Nanopore', 'About A-Alpha Bio', 'Experience with DNA encoded libraries (yeast display, phage display, yeast-two-hybrid)Experience with protein engineering, antibody engineering, and drug discoveryTechnical proficiency with at least 1 macromolecular modeling suite, preferably RosettaFamiliarity with next-generation sequencing platforms, including sample preparation and analysis for Illumina and Oxford NanoporeStrong statistics and data science skills in Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, SciPy)', 'Data-driven drug development enabled by synthetic biology and next generation sequencing', 'We are seeking a skilled Scientist to join our R&D team. The Scientist will work in a small team setting to execute, optimize, and expand our AlphaSeq platform for drug discovery and optimization. From a technical perspective, the role will largely involve designing and constructing plasmids and engineered yeast strains, performing and optimizing yeast assays, and carrying out next-generation sequencing workflows and data analysis. The Scientist will also be responsible for designing, managing, and executing complex internal and external projects and communicating work plans in presentations and written reports. The ideal candidate will be comfortable working independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced and dynamic startup environment.', 'Author detailed, accurate, and accessible documentation of experiments and data', 'Ability to take initiative, multi-task, prioritize, adapt rapidly to changes, and work collaboratively as part of a team with diverse experiences and skill levels', 'Self-motivation, intellectually curiosity, and excitement to carry out interdisciplinary research involving complex experimental and bioinformatics pipelines', 'Required', 'Responsibilities', 'Stay current with scientific literature and present to the team on relevant topics', 'We offer competitive compensation including a pay package, benefits, and significant equity in a fast-growing start-up. Job title will be set based on experience and track record, so we encourage applicants with a wide range of backgrounds to apply.', 'Present scientific findings to the A-Alpha Bio team and to external partners', 'Synthetic biology experience and strong molecular biology skills', 'Design, manage, and execute internal R&D programs to expand and optimize AlphaSeq for drug discovery applications', 'A-Alpha Bio Summary', 'Impressive technical track record at top-tier academic institutions or companies', 'A-Alpha Bio is a seed-stage drug discovery company located in Seattle, WA that partners with pharmaceutical companies to discover, optimize, and characterize high-impact therapeutics.']

S/he builds the automated data pipelines to ingest and prepare the data to meet the reporting and analytics needs of the organization. This includes building and maintaining the data structures and architectures for data ingestion, processing and deployment for large-scale, data-intensive applications. This individual must ensure that optimal ETL (Extract, Transformation, and Load) solutions are developed by applying best practices to the data modeling, code development and automation.', 'As part of an agile team, design, develop and maintain an optimal data pipeline architecture using both structured data sources and big data for both on-premise and cloud-based environments.', 'Position Summary', 'Thorough understanding of relational, columnar and NoSQL database architectures and industry best practices for developmentUnderstanding of dimensional data modeling for designing and building data warehousesExcellent advanced SQL coding and performance tuning skillsExperience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.Experience with parsing data formats such as XML/JSON and leveraging external APIsUnderstanding of agile development methodologiesAbility to work in a team-oriented, collaborative environment; good interpersonal skillsStrong analytical and problem-solving skills; ability to weigh various suggested technical solutions against the original business needs and choose the most cost-effective solutionKeen attention to detail and ability to access impact of design changes prior to implementationSelf-driven, highly motivated and ability to learn quickAbility to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure environmentStrong customer service orientationAbility to present and explain technical information to diverse types of audiences in a way that establishes rapport and gains understandingWork experience with geospatial data and spatial analytics is preferred', 'Understanding of agile development methodologies', 'Other Skills/Abilities', 'Data engineering, data management or cloud certification is a plus', 'Experience/Minimum Requirements', 'Ability to work in a team-oriented, collaborative environment; good interpersonal skills', 'Location: Remote until COVID-19 restrictions are lifted. Preference is to be based in Houston, TX or Canonsburg, PA – but location is open to other major markets and where company offices reside. ', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data pipeline performance, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability and access to information.', 'At least six (6) to eight (8) years of experience in in a data engineering role or related specialty with demonstrated ability in data modeling', 'Design and build dimensional data models to support the data warehouse initiatives.', 'Self-driven, highly motivated and ability to learn quick', 'Essential Job Functions', 'Work experience with geospatial data and spatial analytics is preferred', 'Strong customer service orientation', 'Excellent advanced SQL coding and performance tuning skills', 'At least six (6) to eight (8) years of experience in in a data engineering role or related specialty with demonstrated ability in data modelingAt least two (2) years Data engineering experience on the Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS), or SnowflakeExperience using Extract, Transformation and Load (ETL) tools with Informatica (IICS) to build automated data pipelinesExperience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++']

['', ' Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma.  The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2. We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities.  Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures.  Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical.  The Research Associate is also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or technical issues. The successful candidate should be experienced as a lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager.  Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', 'Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.', 'GAITHERSBURG, MD', 'Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required.', 'Work with human biological specimens. ['', ' Design and execute multi-faceted research plans. These plans typically include qualitative discovery research in homes, primary and secondary research exercises to understand the competitive product set, and evaluation of mock-ups and preliminary concept prototypes in field. Build, grow, and maintain a network of users to understand their evolving needs. Establishing strong relationships with our end users is critical to conducting appropriate discovery research, co-creating solutions, and eliciting honest feedback. Analyze and synthesize research findings into key insights that inform opportunities for new features, functionalities, and business approaches. Plan and facilitate hands-on evaluations, team workshops, and analysis sessions. These participatory co-creation sessions result in a common ground of familiarity with products and their use, while inspiring creativity and collaboration within the team. Present research findings in an engaging and concise manner to key stakeholders across the business.
