['', ' Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma.  The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2. We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities.  Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures.  Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical.  The Research Associate is also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or technical issues. The successful candidate should be experienced as a lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager.  Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', 'Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required.', 'The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2.', 'RESEARCH ASSOCIATE - IMMUNOLOGY', 'Experience working in a CLIA or GLP environment preferred.', 'MUST BE ELIGIBLE TO WORK IN THE U.S. AS AN HOURLY W2 EMPLOYEE', 'SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, CA', 'W2 ONLY', 'karen@alphaconsulting.com', 'Experience working with lab automation (e.g. Agilent Bravo; Integra ViaFlo, AssistPlus) preferred.', 'Project Description:  ', 'Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical. ', 'Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures. ', 'Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', 'The Research Associate is also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or technical issues.', "ALPHA'S REQUIREMENT #20-01510", ' California licensure as Clinical Laboratory Scientist (CLS) or Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT). Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required. Experience working in a Biological Safety Cabinet required. Experience working with lab automation (e.g. Agilent Bravo; Integra ViaFlo, AssistPlus) preferred. Experience working in a CLIA or GLP environment preferred. Clinical diagnostics background preferred.\t• Work with human biological specimens. HepB Vaccination advised.\t• Work with samples which may contain SARS-CoV-2.\t• Attention to detail to ensure chain of custody of all samples.\t• Working and communicating across a fast-paced cross organizational team.\t• Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.\t• Ability to follow laboratory specified documentation practices\t• Ability to handle human specimens with appropriate precautions\t• Ability to follow CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) procedures', 'California licensure as Clinical Laboratory Scientist (CLS) or Medical Laboratory Technician (MLT).', 'Required Skills:  ', 'We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities. ', 'The successful candidate should be experienced as a lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager. ', 'Experience working in a Biological Safety Cabinet required.', 'Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma. ', 'This 6+ month position starts ASAP.', 'Please E-MAIL your resume (attachment to email) with rate and availability to Karen: ', 'Clinical diagnostics background preferred.\t• Work with human biological specimens. HepB Vaccination advised.\t• Work with samples which may contain SARS-CoV-2.\t• Attention to detail to ensure chain of custody of all samples.\t• Working and communicating across a fast-paced cross organizational team.\t• Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.\t• Ability to follow laboratory specified documentation practices\t• Ability to handle human specimens with appropriate precautions\t• Ability to follow CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) procedures']

['Greylock Talent: ', 'Greylock Talent:', "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", "One of their current projects is to\xa0build cross-cutting features in the dataplane by using and extending state of the art service mesh technologies. If this type of work sounds interesting, I'd love to hear from you =) ", 'Application Process:', 'Due to the volume of applicants we typically receive from our job postings, a follow-up email will not be sent until a match is identified with one of our investments. ', 'Application Process: ', "I will contact anyone who looks like a potential match for this opportunity--requesting to schedule a call with you immediately. Once contacted, I'll explain our VC Recruiting model, spend some time getting to know you better, and will discuss various startup opportunities within our portfolio with you as well. ", ' ', 'One of our investments is looking to reimagine the architecture and design of a prominent, large-scale healthcare technology platform (which currently drives over $150M ARR). Led by seasoned experts from Amazon AWS, Cloudera, etc.--this team owns the foundational infrastructure that every data scientist, machine learning, and software engineer in the company relies upon. Sitting\xa0at the bottom of the stack (right above AWS), they often like to bend Kubernetes and Istio to their will to make "magic happen".\xa0 ']

job_title: Sr. Principal Scientist/Principal Scientist - Respiratory Diseases
job_text: ['', 'Duties & Responsibilities', ' Develop and implement experimental ideas for delivering highly differentiated disease positioning concepts for targets in portfolio. Keep abreast of current literature and drive novel science by bringing new methods and assays relevant to Pulmonary Fibrosis-Interstitial Lung Diseases.  Ability to lead a group of scientists by directing and overseeing the design, execution and interpretation of studies.  As appropriate, serve as project Leader on portfolio projects.Responsible for working in collaboration with the Medicinal Chemistry or Biotherapeutics project leaders to shape and drive project strategy and advance the project up to start of clinical development. Twitter is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, veteran, genetic information, marital status or any other legally protected status.San Francisco applicants Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.Engineering hiring processStep 1Once your application is received, a recruiter will reach out pending your qualifications are a match for the role.Step 2If your background is a match, you may have 1-2 technical phone interviews or be given the chance to provide a work sample depending on the role.Step 3If the phone interviews go well or your work sample is strong, the final step includes interviews with 5-6 people via a video conference call.ApplicationRead Twitter's Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policy here .U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity information (Completion is voluntary)Voluntary InformationPrivacy and dataStaff Machine Learning Engineer - Health ML Locations San Francisco, Remote US, SeattleAdditional InformationWe are committed to an inclusive and diverse Twitter. You will participate in the engineering life-cycle at Twitter, including designing distributed systems, writing production code and data pipelines, conducting code reviews and working alongside our infrastructure and reliability teams. You’ll apply data science, machine learning, and/or graph analysis techniques to a variety of modeling and relevance problems involving users, their social graph, their tweets, and their behavior.Are you an engineer who’s interested in tackling very challenging adversarial problems and passionate about defending online users against abuse, spam, and manipulation? Will you be proud to work on a real-time, scalable system that serves millions of users daily? ['', ' Understands and stays up-to-date on waiver regulations and associated application procedures.', ' Performs accurate and timely audit assessments based on Medicaid eligibility and requirements.', ' Attends professional meetings, civic meetings or other meetings to gather or distribute program or technical information.', " Conducts analysis of services within the waiver as well as issues identified within the MWMA, system communication, member and provider calls, communication from the ombudsman's office and/or legislation.", " Provides clinical decisions, completes waiver audits, and collects valuable data to ensure research objectives are met. Understands and stays up-to-date on waiver regulations and associated application procedures. Performs accurate and timely audit assessments based on Medicaid eligibility and requirements. Reviews resolutions to member issues evaluated for the Medicaid Waiver Management Application (MWMA). Provides feedback on audit reports. Conducts analysis of services within the waiver as well as issues identified within the MWMA, system communication, member and provider calls, communication from the ombudsman's office and/or legislation. Attends professional meetings, civic meetings or other meetings to gather or distribute program or technical information. Coordinates with various Cabinet Departments on related task forces and committees.", 'Job Summary', ' Provides feedback on audit reports.', ' Reviews resolutions to member issues evaluated for the Medicaid Waiver Management Application (MWMA).', ' Provides clinical decisions, completes waiver audits, and collects valuable data to ensure research objectives are met.', ' Coordinates with various Cabinet Departments on related task forces and committees.']

['Job Description:', '', 'Must have had proven successful experience in the integration of consumer research into a business’s product design practice.', 'Requires a BA/BS in Human Computer Interactions, Psychology, Information Sciences, Communications or related field required; 3+ years of experience including 3-5 years working in user research/usability; or any combination of education and experience which would provide an equivalent background.', 'Design, author and execute test plans, as well as evaluating the results for evidence based research to develop recommendations.', 'Experience related requirement, a UX Researcher candidate must display a strong comprehension of the strengths and limitations of the different research methods, inclusive of when and how to apply each in product/market/consumer analyses.', 'Candidate must display a genuine passion for product-centric innovation; an ability to work well independently as well as with a team; must have a keen and exceptional attention to detail; and more importantly, an ability to identify root recommendations inspired by the consumers’ needs and behaviors.', 'Skillsets:', 'Experience in product usability testing tools, for example Keynote.', 'Identify appropriate research methodologies to address key business needs and to ensure the research provides clear actionable recommendations.', 'Responsible for conducting qualitative and quantitative research for the Digital Solutions team to assist our business partners to build and deliver leading-edge web/application solutions.', 'Identify appropriate research methodologies to address key business needs and to ensure the research provides clear actionable recommendations.Design studies to address both user behavior and attitudes while using qualitative and quantitative data to assist in the creation of effective, desirable and easy to use digital user interfaces.This may include surveys, moderated and unmoderated usability testing, card sorts, tree testing, intercept studies, focus groups, ethnographic field studies for both web and mobile experiences.Design, author and execute test plans, as well as evaluating the results for evidence based research to develop recommendations.Ability to manage 2-3 research projects.Requires a BA/BS in Human Computer Interactions, Psychology, Information Sciences, Communications or related field required; 3+ years of experience including 3-5 years working in user research/usability; or any combination of education and experience which would provide an equivalent background.', 'Primary duties may include, but are not limited to:', 'Ability to manage 2-3 research projects.', 'At least 2 years of work experience in statistical analysis, qualitative analysis, quantitative analysis, product usability moderating, experimental design, and test method selection. In addition,Must have had proven successful experience in the integration of consumer research into a business’s product design practice.Experience in product usability testing tools, for example Keynote.Experience related requirement, a UX Researcher candidate must display a strong comprehension of the strengths and limitations of the different research methods, inclusive of when and how to apply each in product/market/consumer analyses.Candidate possess excellent communication skills to be able to relay these research methodology concepts and findings to product department personnel and to other collaborating personnel in a clear, simple, and relatable manner.Candidate must possess an effective problem solving ability even under short notice. The UX Researcher must be able to come up with creative solutions and consider a variety of alternative solutions for each problemCandidate must show proficiency in Sketch, InDesign, Illustrator, Keynote and Photoshop computer software(s).Candidate must display a genuine passion for product-centric innovation; an ability to work well independently as well as with a team; must have a keen and exceptional attention to detail; and more importantly, an ability to identify root recommendations inspired by the consumers’ needs and behaviors.', 'Design studies to address both user behavior and attitudes while using qualitative and quantitative data to assist in the creation of effective, desirable and easy to use digital user interfaces.', 'Candidate possess excellent communication skills to be able to relay these research methodology concepts and findings to product department personnel and to other collaborating personnel in a clear, simple, and relatable manner.', 'Candidate must show proficiency in Sketch, InDesign, Illustrator, Keynote and Photoshop computer software(s).', 'At least 2 years of work experience in statistical analysis, qualitative analysis, quantitative analysis, product usability moderating, experimental design, and test method selection. In addition,', 'This may include surveys, moderated and unmoderated usability testing, card sorts, tree testing, intercept studies, focus groups, ethnographic field studies for both web and mobile experiences.', 'Candidate must possess an effective problem solving ability even under short notice. The UX Researcher must be able to come up with creative solutions and consider a variety of alternative solutions for each problem']

', ' ', 'Work with partners including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. ', 'Candidate with 3+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. 3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Strong Programming experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python/Scala, Spark. 3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc 1+ years of experience with AWS cloud services: S3, EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc. (Nice to have) 1+ Years of experience with relational SQL, Snowflake and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. ', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, Assemble large, sophisticated data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements. Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability etc. Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘Big data’ technologies. Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to deliver impactful insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. Work with partners including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. ', '3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc ', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, Assemble large, sophisticated data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements. ', '1+ Years of experience with relational SQL, Snowflake and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. ', '3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Strong Programming experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python/Scala, Spark. ', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. ', 'Cognizant will not be able to provide sponsorship for this role. Candidates have the option of working remotely.', 'By applying AI and data science, we help leading companies to prototype, refine, validate, and scale their AI and analytics products and delivery models. Cognizant’s AIA practice takes insights that are buried in data, and provides businesses a clear way to transform how they source, interpret and consume their information. Our clients need flexible data structures and a streamlined data architecture that quickly turns data resources into informative, meaningful intelligence. ', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability etc. ', '1+ years of experience with AWS cloud services: S3, EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift ', 'About AI & Analytics: Artificial intelligence (AI) and the data it collects and analyzes will soon sit at the core of all intelligent, human-centric businesses. By decoding customer needs, preferences, and behaviors, our clients can understand exactly what services, products, and experiences their consumers need. Within AI & Analytics, we work to design the future—a future in which trial-and-error business decisions have been replaced by informed choices and data-supported strategies. ', '\xa0 ', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘Big data’ technologies. ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to deliver impactful insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Cognizant is looking for Python/AWS Developer to join our Artificial Intelligence and Analytics practice (AIA) for a remote project. As a trusted advisor, responsible for providing an approach for the overall project. As a domain specialist, you will drive technology discussions and analyze the existing gaps in addressing business needs. You are a thought leader-comfortable challenging the status quo to enhance our current services and technologies. ']

['', 'You’re an excellent communicator and collaborator. You pride yourself on your clear verbal and written communication, and your ability to share and evangelize research findings in a clear and compelling way to diverse audiences including executives.', 'You will help train members of our team on research best practices as designers continue to conduct their own research. ', 'You have the ability to adjust your level of depth and time spent in research in order deliver on projects of varying sizes', 'You don’t fear complexity. You recognize that impactful change requires understanding not only of product, but of organization and culture. You’re not afraid to dive into research on complex software with a broad user base of users and engineers. ', 'Who We Are Looking For', '5+ years experience as a User Researcher (experience in AdTech is a plus)', 'You will pioneer the use of analytics within the UX team and pair with other teams to get more readily available access to helpful data', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Proactive, inquisitive, have a natural empathy for users, and you love translating research questions into a clear research plan and then executing on it in a fast-paced environment', 'You know how to track, communicate, and evangelize insights, your research to the larger organization. You evangelize your research findings, collaborate on projects to understand our customers’ end-to-end customer journey, and to promote UX research as a strategic driver for our products and services.', 'You can effectively lead design thinking workshops to plan and prioritize research, and to translate customer insights into product direction.', 'You will manage and be responsible for our growing list of external and internal testers, and reaching out to users who match desired personas to facilitate testing on behalf of the design team.', 'Prior design experience or background a plus', 'You share customer insights with the broader organization to increase internal knowledge of customers and their workflows', 'Experience working with a UI/UX design teams as well as establishing and scaling research structures at organizations', 'You will work as a member of our UX/UI Design team, planning and executing a full-cycle research program from early strategic direction through post-release validation in an agile development process.', 'You involve stakeholders, in every stage of your research from planning to execution to analysis.', 'You can implement and utilize a variety of research and testing tools to validate and guide design concepts, from user research and user story generation/validation, participatory design workshops, interviews, usability studies, and quantitative methods such as surveys and data analytics.', '5+ years experience as a User Researcher (experience in AdTech is a plus)You are a story teller. You recognize that impactful change requires understanding not only of product, but of organization and culture. You can effectively lead design thinking workshops to plan and prioritize research, and to translate customer insights into product direction.You know how to track, communicate, and evangelize insights, your research to the larger organization. ['', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Ph.D. in Operations Research or a closely related field.', ' MS in in Operational Research, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field. ['', 'Job Description:', 'Research and develop new ML models as necessary to meet agreed upon product requirements and goals\xa0', 'Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models\xa0', 'Ability to adapt quickly and constructively to changes\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'A breadth of technical aptitude to talk shop to our engineers Ambitious, accountable, and be a self-starter', 'Benefits:', 'Work with the Customer Success team to assist as needed with complex escalation, training on new detection methods and best practices for effectively defending against attacks\xa0', 'Competitive salary, equity, and a robust benefits package includes top-notch medical, dental, vision, life insurance, 401k, commuter benefits and we cover 95% of the cost of employee benefits and 65% of the cost of dependent care coverage!\xa0', "Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0", 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Nice to haves:', 'Ability to code, experiment and fail fast\xa0', '3+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0', 'Required Skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Deep Learning, Data Modeling, HTTP, DNS, HTML, JavaScript, JS, CSS, Python, R, SQL', 'Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0', 'Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0', 'We are a fast-growing startup that is disrupting the fraud industry by putting the control back into the hands of digital businesses with an innovative approach that bankrupts the underlying business model of fraudsters. Our fraud and abuse prevention platform combines real-time intelligence, rich analytics and adaptive step-up challenges to progressively diminish the profitability of attacks while adapting to evolving attack patterns. We offer the only fraud solution with a 100% SLA guarantee. The world’s largest brands trust us to protect their customer journey while delivering unrivaled customer experience.', 'Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0', 'Company Description:', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0Startup Experience', 'General Requirements:', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0', 'Solid understanding of the world wide web ecosystem, including protocols (HTTP, DNS), coding (HTML, JS, CSS), issues around privacy…\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0', 'Research product workflow change or features that will improve detection and ensure optimal user experience\xa0', 'We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', "Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0Research and develop new ML models as necessary ['', 'Design studies to address both user behavior and attitudes while using qualitative and quantitative data to assist in the creation of effective, desirable and easy to use digital user interfaces.', 'Design, author and execute test plans, as well as evaluating the results for evidence based research to develop recommendations.', 'As a UX Researcher, you will:', 'We are looking for a UX Researcher who will be responsible for conducting qualitative and quantitative research for the Digital Solutions team to assist business partners to build and deliver leading-edge web/application solutions.', 'Identify appropriate research methodologies to address key business needs and to ensure the research provides clear actionable recommendations.', 'This may include surveys, moderated and unmoderated usability testing, card sorts, tree testing, intercept studies, focus groups, ethnographic field studies for both web and mobile experiences.', 'Identify appropriate research methodologies to address key business needs and to ensure the research provides clear actionable recommendations.Design studies to address both user behavior and attitudes while using qualitative and quantitative data to assist in the creation of effective, desirable and easy to use digital user interfaces.This may include surveys, moderated and unmoderated usability testing, card sorts, tree testing, intercept studies, focus groups, ethnographic field studies for both web and mobile experiences.Design, author and execute test plans, as well as evaluating the results for evidence based research to develop recommendations.']

', 'Create data tools for analytics and data      scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our      product into an innovative industry leader. ', 'Should be independent in working and story interpretation and ready to start from Day 1 ', 'About AI & Analytics: Artificial intelligence (AI) and the data it collects and analyzes will soon sit at the core of all intelligent, human-centric businesses. By decoding customer needs, preferences, and behaviors, our clients can understand exactly what services, products, and experiences their consumers need. Within AI & Analytics, we work to design the future—a future in which trial-and-error business decisions have been replaced by informed choices and data-supported strategies. ', '\xa0 ', 'Cognizant is looking for Spark Developer to join our Artificial Intelligence and Analytics practice (AIA) for a remote project. ['', ' Understands and stays up-to-date on waiver regulations and associated application procedures.', ' Performs accurate and timely audit assessments based on Medicaid eligibility and requirements.', ' Attends professional meetings, civic meetings or other meetings to gather or distribute program or technical information.', " Conducts analysis of services within the waiver as well as issues identified within the MWMA, system communication, member and provider calls, communication from the ombudsman's office and/or legislation.", " Provides clinical decisions, completes waiver audits, and collects valuable data to ensure research objectives are met. Understands and stays up-to-date on waiver regulations and associated application procedures. Performs accurate and timely audit assessments based on Medicaid eligibility and requirements. Coordinates with various Cabinet Departments on related task forces and committees.", 'Job Summary', ' Provides feedback on audit reports.', ' Reviews resolutions to member issues evaluated for the Medicaid Waiver Management Application (MWMA).', ' Provides clinical decisions, completes waiver audits, and collects valuable data to ensure research objectives are met.', ' Coordinates with various Cabinet Departments on related task forces and committees.']

3+ years of experience including 3-5 years working in user research/usability; or any combination of education and experience which would provide an equivalent background.', 'Design, author and execute test plans, as well as evaluating the results for evidence based research to develop recommendations.', 'Experience related requirement, a UX Researcher candidate must display a strong comprehension of the strengths and limitations of the different research methods, inclusive of when and how to apply each in product/market/consumer analyses.', 'Candidate must display a genuine passion for product-centric innovation; an ability to work well independently as well as with a team; must have a keen and exceptional attention to detail; and more importantly, an ability to identify root recommendations inspired by the consumers’ needs and behaviors.', 'Skillsets:', 'Experience in product usability testing tools, for example Keynote.', 'Identify appropriate research methodologies to address key business needs and to ensure the research provides clear actionable recommendations.', 'Responsible for conducting qualitative and quantitative research for the Digital Solutions team to assist our business partners to build and deliver leading-edge web/application solutions.', 'Identify appropriate research methodologies to address key business needs and to ensure the research provides clear actionable recommendations.Design studies to address both user behavior and attitudes while using qualitative and quantitative data to assist in the creation of effective, desirable and easy to use digital user interfaces.This may include surveys, moderated and unmoderated usability testing, card sorts, tree testing, intercept studies, focus groups, ethnographic field studies for both web and mobile experiences.Design, author and execute test plans, as well as evaluating the results for evidence based research to develop recommendations.Ability to manage 2-3 research projects.Requires a BA/BS in Human Computer Interactions, Psychology, Information Sciences, Communications or related field required; 3+ years of experience including 3-5 years working in user research/usability; or any combination of education and experience which would provide an equivalent background.', 'We are looking for someone who is passionate about UI/UX with the desire to help our client build a HCD practice in an enterprise environment.', 'Primary duties may include, but are not limited to:', 'Ability to manage 2-3 research projects.', 'At least 2 years of work experience in statistical analysis, qualitative analysis, quantitative analysis, product usability moderating, experimental design, and test method selection. In addition,Must have had proven successful experience in the integration of consumer research into a business’s product design practice.Experience in product usability testing tools, for example Keynote.Experience related requirement, a UX Researcher candidate must display a strong comprehension of the strengths and limitations of the different research methods, inclusive of when and how to apply each in product/market/consumer analyses.Candidate possess excellent communication skills to be able to relay these research methodology concepts and findings to product department personnel and to other collaborating personnel in a clear, simple, and relatable manner.Candidate must possess an effective problem solving ability even under short notice. The UX Researcher must be able to come up with creative solutions and consider a variety of alternative solutions for each problemCandidate must show proficiency in Sketch, InDesign, Illustrator, Keynote and Photoshop computer software(s).Candidate must display a genuine passion for product-centric innovation; an ability to work well independently as well as with a team; must have a keen and exceptional attention to detail; and more importantly, an ability to identify root recommendations inspired by the consumers’ needs and behaviors.', 'Design studies to address both user behavior and attitudes while using qualitative and quantitative data to assist in the creation of effective, desirable and easy to use digital user interfaces.', 'Candidate possess excellent communication skills to be able to relay these research methodology concepts and findings to product department personnel and to other collaborating personnel in a clear, simple, and relatable manner.', 'Candidate must show proficiency in Sketch, InDesign, Illustrator, Keynote and Photoshop computer software(s).', 'At least 2 years of work experience in statistical analysis, qualitative analysis, quantitative analysis, product usability moderating, experimental design, and test method selection. In addition,', 'This may include surveys, moderated and unmoderated usability testing, card sorts, tree testing, intercept studies, focus groups, ethnographic field studies for both web and mobile experiences.', 'Candidate must possess an effective problem solving ability even under short notice. The UX Researcher must be able to come up with creative solutions and consider a variety of alternative solutions for each problem']

Customer engagements include migration of existing functionality, evolution of existing capabilities and process, and development of new applications using AWS cloud services. job_title: Post Doctoral Research Scientist - DCRT FDE
job_text: ['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Design and implement data-driven AI DND methods able to accommodate multiple objectives to generate novel molecules.Explore new, alternative ways to encode 2D/3D and property information including, for example, 3D ligand-target information, precedent reaction knowledge, etc.Define appropriate framework(s) for the design of molecules within the optimal multi-objective spaceImplement and apply a robust DND performance assessment process taking into account chemical space coverage.Mine available pharmaceutical data required for the preparation of robust machine learning models to use as pharmaceutical objectivesCollaborate within a vibrant interdisciplinary team to identify areas of key need across pre-clinical discovery and champion creative solutions to address those needs.Maintain external awareness and share learnings to benefit the organization.Present findings at conferences and publish in high quality peer-reviewed journals.', ' Mentoring by some of Lilly’s top scientists ', ' Collaboration and networking across other postdoctoral scientists and researchers ', 'Self-directed and highly motivated individual who wants to learn new techniques while continually pursuing research and publication goals.', 'Excellent communicator (oral and written) with presentation experience, along with a strong publication record.', ' Top industry research experience  Mentoring by some of Lilly’s top scientists  Training and coaching opportunities to further your development  Collaboration and networking across other postdoctoral scientists and researchers ', 'Hands-on experience with at least one of the major cheminformatics toolkits and one of the major AI/DL/ML packages (for example TensorFlow, PyTorch).', ' This position is not permanent. It is for a fixed duration of two years with potential to extend to 3 years and for maximum of up to 4 years. You will have opportunities to apply for full time positions after your duration is complete. ', 'You have the ability to adjust your level of depth and time spent in research in order deliver on projects of varying sizes', 'You don’t fear complexity. ['', 'You’re an excellent communicator and collaborator. You pride yourself on your clear verbal and written communication, and your ability to share and evangelize research findings in a clear and compelling way to diverse audiences including executives.', 'You will help train members of our team on research best practices as designers continue to conduct their own research. ', 'You have the ability to adjust your level of depth and time spent in research in order deliver on projects of varying sizes', 'You don’t fear complexity. You recognize that impactful change requires understanding not only of product, but of organization and culture. You’re not afraid to dive into research on complex software with a broad user base of users and engineers. ', 'Who We Are Looking For', '5+ years experience as a User Researcher (experience in AdTech is a plus)', 'You will pioneer the use of analytics within the UX team and pair with other teams to get more readily available access to helpful data', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Proactive, inquisitive, have a natural empathy for users, and you love translating research questions into a clear research plan and then executing on it in a fast-paced environment', 'You know how to track, communicate, and evangelize insights, your research to the larger organization. You evangelize your research findings, collaborate on projects to understand our customers’ end-to-end customer journey, and to promote UX research as a strategic driver for our products and services.', 'You can effectively lead design thinking workshops to plan and prioritize research, and to translate customer insights into product direction.', 'You will manage and be responsible for our growing list of external and internal testers, and reaching out to users who match desired personas to facilitate testing on behalf of the design team.', 'Prior design experience or background a plus', 'You share customer insights with the broader organization to increase internal knowledge of customers and their workflows', 'Experience working with a UI/UX design teams as well as establishing and scaling research structures at organizations', 'You will work as a member of our UX/UI Design team, planning and executing a full-cycle research program from early strategic direction through post-release validation in an agile development process.', 'You involve stakeholders, in every stage of your research from planning to execution to analysis.', 'You can implement and utilize a variety of research and testing tools to validate and guide design concepts, from user research and user story generation/validation, participatory design workshops, interviews, usability studies, and quantitative methods such as surveys and data analytics.', '5+ years experience as a User Researcher (experience in AdTech is a plus)You are a story teller. You know how to deliver your research findings to communicate action items to your stakeholdersYou’re an excellent communicator and collaborator. You pride yourself on your clear verbal and written communication, and your ability to share and evangelize research findings in a clear and compelling way to diverse audiences including executives.You don’t fear complexity. You recognize that impactful change requires understanding not only of product, but of organization and culture. You’re not afraid to dive into research on complex software with a broad user base of users and engineers. Up-to-date with the latest UI/UX standards, research trends, design best practices and technologiesStrong background in conducting usability studies.Proactive, inquisitive, have a natural empathy for users, and you love translating research questions into a clear research plan and then executing on it in a fast-paced environmentYou have the ability to adjust your level of depth and time spent in research in order deliver on projects of varying sizesExperience working with a UI/UX design teams as well as establishing and scaling research structures at organizationsPrior design experience or background a plusExperience leading design sprints a plusExperience in a programmatic advertising is a plusAgile development experience is a plus', 'What You Bring To The Table', 'You will work as a member of our UX/UI Design team, planning and executing a full-cycle research program from early strategic direction through post-release validation in an agile development process.You can implement and utilize a variety of research and testing tools to validate and guide design concepts, from user research and user story generation/validation, participatory design workshops, interviews, usability studies, and quantitative methods such as surveys and data analytics.You will conduct on-site and remote usability studies with internal and external Trade Desk employees and customersYou involve stakeholders, in every stage of your research from planning to execution to analysis.You will help train members of our team on research best practices as designers continue to conduct their own research. You can effectively lead design thinking workshops to plan and prioritize research, and to translate customer insights into product direction.You know how to track, communicate, and evangelize insights, your research to the larger organization. You evangelize your research findings, collaborate on projects to understand our customers’ end-to-end customer journey, and to promote UX research as a strategic driver for our products and services.You will pioneer the use of analytics within the UX team and pair with other teams to get more readily available access to helpful dataYou will manage and be responsible for our growing list of external and internal testers, and reaching out to users who match desired personas to facilitate testing on behalf of the design team.You share customer insights with the broader organization to increase internal knowledge of customers and their workflows', 'Strong background in conducting usability studies.', 'Experience leading design sprints a plus', 'You are a story teller. You know how to deliver your research findings to communicate action items to your stakeholders', 'Experience in a programmatic advertising is a plus', 'You will conduct on-site and remote usability studies with internal and external Trade Desk employees and customers', 'Up-to-date with the latest UI/UX standards, research trends, design best practices and technologies', 'Agile development experience is a plus']

['', 'You’re an excellent communicator and collaborator. You pride yourself on your clear verbal and written communication, and your ability to share and evangelize research findings in a clear and compelling way to diverse audiences including executives.', 'You will help train members of our team on research best practices as designers continue to conduct their own research. ', 'You have the ability to adjust your level of depth and time spent in research in order deliver on projects of varying sizes', 'You don’t fear complexity.
